reversed.challenge: If it sounds too good to be true, it probably is. Be cautious of new opportunities, people or deals that feel shady.
reversed.crowns: There is no need for you to worry about not knowing everything, as long as you are true to yourself the Universe will be there to balance the scales when you take that leap of faith.
reversed.future: Let go of your fear of failure or ridicule for being different, life has an unknowable amount of possibility in the future.
reversed.influences: Risky and distracting, due your due diligence before committing to anything.
reversed.outcome: You'll learn as you go, probably make some novice mistakes but it doesn't really matter in the log run.
reversed.past: Your lack of experience lead you to make a bad decision.
reversed.root: You live for the moment, and take a lot of risks, often these can be more quiet and personal acts of recklessness in an attempt to be spontaneous and free.
reversed.self: You feel like you don't belong, you're an imposter or not good enough for others.
reversed.situation: Missed opportunities as a result of your behavior, acting foolish, not trusting your intuition or speaking carelessly.

upright.challenge: Lighten up, allow yourself to be spontaneous or silly, release your expectations of yourself.
upright.crowns: Accessing your higher ideals you can make a fresh start, seek new experiences.
upright.future: An environment of folly, mania, and extravagance possibly a new chapter blinded by ignorance, you must listen to warnings.
upright.hope: An act of indiscretion reveals a faulty choice.
upright.influences: The naivete, foolish, foolhardy, and blundering ideas of the novice.
upright.outcome: The generative power of nature whirls chaos into a creative center.
upright.past: A blind innocence, and negligent faith has been revealed.
upright.root: You are a natural optimist, you know how unpredictable life can be, that every challenge comes with an opportunity, and you don't spend time worrying about things that are out of your control.
upright.self: You may give in to extravagance, intoxication, and delirium.
upright.situation: This is a time of freshness and spontaneity, be ready to embrace whatever comes.

Fool.description: An innocent soul is seen before their descent into matter, beginning an inner journey toward self knowledge.
Fool.keywords: spontaneous, open minded, playful, unaware, curiosity
Fool.name: Fool
Fool.reversedKeywords: careless, distracted, naive, foolish, gullible, stale, dull
Fool.title: The Spirit of the Ether

reversed.challenge: You may be in the presence of an untrustworthy charmer, or a manipulative influence, check yourself before you respond.
reversed.crowns: If you can stop doubting yourself you would be able to recognize the Synchronicities unfolding around you, leading you to the place you want to be.
reversed.future: A promise will be broken or deal is going to end poorly.
reversed.influences: Schemes, tricks and lies.
reversed.outcome: No motivation, you're already in too deep to be of any benefit, don't waste your energy or give away your talents.
reversed.past: An event occurred that has you thinking about possibilities.
reversed.root: You're hesitant to use your Higher and Universal Power either from fear or ignorance.
reversed.self: Sometimes you have to use deception to get what you want.
reversed.situation: In need of a reality, take a step back from the situation, reassess things with a different perspective.

upright.challenge: There is mental illness, disgrace, disquiet, loss, or disaster which requires you to take action.
upright.crowns: The use of mental skill, diplomacy, and address to fulfill your own will.
upright.future: Self-confidence will plan and arrange your world to your will.
upright.hope: Taking charge of things according to your own will.
upright.influences: A person or group of people with skill, whom use diplomacy and action to take charge.
upright.outcome: A transparent intelligence will reveal a plan for you to take charge according to your own will, "as above, so below."
upright.past: Wisdom gained by loss and disaster have taken a toll on self-confidence.
upright.root: You have great self-control, by possessing skills of will and action you have the ability to transform your world at will.
upright.self: You are quick to reason and to offer creative solutions, a smooth talker.
upright.situation: Your self-confidence and your will are in harmony, you are in a position to take charge.

Magician.description:
The Adept figure standing before an alter of magical implements. One hand is raised upward, holding a wand, while one hand, empty, is gesturing in a downward pointing fashion. Above their head floats an infinity symbol as blooming rose vines hang over head and below.

As above, so below.

Traditionally a magician performs some performative display of magic, but this magician is anyone that is doing self work to bring forth the Divine within themselves.
Magician.name: Magician
Magician.title: The Magus of Power

reversed.challenge: Controlling your own emotions while being straight with others.
reversed.crowns: Find a center of calm within you. Trust that you will be able to return to this place inside of yourself at any time. If you are experiencing social dramas eliminate all suspicion, paranoia, and assumptions, only then will you be able to have an open and honest conversation about it.
reversed.future: Confusion leads to blurred meanings, be clear on agreements now to avoid injury later.
reversed.influences: Knowledge is being withheld, reticence is equal to lying in this situation.
reversed.outcome: Follow your hunches and you will be okay.
reversed.past: You lost a connection, or something meaningful in your life and it has changed you since.
reversed.root: Second guessing yourself can be healthy, you have good instincts when you don't repress and ignore them.
reversed.self: You feel disconnected like there's something missing that isn't making any sense to you.
reversed.situation: Perpetually busy, always doing something.

upright.challenge: Overcome silence and conceit based on surface knowledge of secrets.
upright.crowns: As you learn how to access intuitive knowledge from within your subconscious mind you will experience heightened awareness and empathy. Embrace your feminine energies, connect with your ability to nurture and grow, choose to collaborate and create rather than compete and destroy.
upright.future: Secrets and mystery will be revealed.
upright.influences: A uniting force realizing spiritual truth.
upright.outcome: Wisdom is gained through trusting your intuition.
upright.past: Your subconscious powers will be charged, surface knowledge clouds a situation in which your gut disagreed.
upright.root: Your intuition allows you to cross over what is matter, energy, space, time without mystery.
upright.self: You remain silent in conceit of secrets and surface knowledge.
upright.situation: Calm and passive, waiting for the truth to reveal itself, trusting your intuition.

High Priestess.description:
A virginal goddess sits between two pillars, Boaz and Jachin, draped in luminous robes, a scroll with the letters TORA shown, the truth behind the veil of light. 

Knowing without knowing, intuition.
High Priestess.name: High Priestess
High Priestess.title: The Priestess of the Silver Star

reversed.challenge: Take care of yourself the way you would take care of someone you love.
reversed.crowns: Surround yourself with nature to unblock creative energies and overcome superficial setbacks.
reversed.future: Well intention acts may go overboard and have a repelling effect.
reversed.influences: Overbearing and smothering, roadblocks and slow progress. Domestic relationships are possibly strained.
reversed.outcome: Very little growth or lack of turnout.
reversed.past: Overprotective behavior changed the nature of a relationship.
reversed.root: Your word is final and you demand obedience from friends and family alike.
reversed.self: You think being a control freak is a good thing.
reversed.situation: Feminine energy revives inspiration and self confidence, even sexual desire.

upright.challenge: Karmic mood swings can wipe out plans.
upright.crowns: Mother abilities in a good sense, patient, loving, generous.
upright.future: There may be an actual birth, or a metaphorical one of an idea or artistic expression.
upright.influences: Feminine and nurturing, motherly figures.
upright.outcome: Good fortune will be bestowed upon whatever new ideas or activities you chose to indulge yourself with.
upright.past: Vacillation, or diva like behavior has caused some dissatisfaction in your relationships.
upright.root: You naturally take on the role of nurturer, caretaker or provider, you see it as a way to give as well as receive.
upright.self: You can be difficult in unraveling involved matters.
upright.situation: There is an unraveling of involved matters.

Empress.description:
A voluptuous, possibly pregnant, Mother Nature holding a scepter wearing a crown of twelve stars and robes adorned with pomegranates, sits upon red heart shaped velvet cushions embroidered with the symbol of Venus. The environment is one of Earthly abundance, fertile land, lush forests and crops.

The Empress is to the Occult what the High Priestess is to Religion. She represents a person that wants for nothing, with seductive powers and a connection to the mystical realm.
Empress.keywords: maturity, love and mercy, luck, abundance
Empress.name: Empress
Empress.reversedKeywords: creative block, dependent on others, smothering, pregnancy issues, low self esteem
Empress.title: Daughter of the Mighty Ones

reversed.challenge: Instead of rebelling outwardly find different approaches to gain your independence.
reversed.crowns: Wisdom and strength to walk away from a situation that is inequitable and abusive.
reversed.future: Self assertion may strain some relationships prohibiting your freedom.
reversed.influences: Surrounded by petty tyrannical people, insistent upon self indulgence and flattery.
reversed.outcome: A negative presence from authoritative powers will create a struggle for control.
reversed.past: Procrastinating on doing something or confronting someone because you knew it would be uncomfortable.
reversed.root: You're aware of those awaiting a time to make a power play for dominance.
reversed.self: You prefer your own version of events, especially if history isn't flattering to your perspectives.
reversed.situation: The influence of a powerful yet toxic energy is trying to domineer you.

upright.challenge: Teach and discipline with wisdom and benevolence, use strong logic and compassionate words.
upright.crowns: Gaining authority, asserting yourself with energy and strength.
upright.future: You will be involved with some kind of established order, or some one who is a representative of something powerful and widespread. You may feel a need to belong to them, driven by a desire to show strength and power.
upright.influences: Predictability, people of conviction and reason, fatherly figures.
upright.outcome: Expectations of conformity and behavioral demands will be made, however compassion will be shown.
upright.past: An authority figure was strict with you in the past, possibly too harsh, it had a lasting impact on you for good or bad.
upright.root: You have the aid of reason over emotion when it comes to making important decisions.
upright.self: Your confidence comes from a solid foundation of well established successes.
upright.situation: The guidance of a more experienced person or the structure of an organized environment is significant to you at this time.

Emperor.description:
A crowned, armored and robed, masculine figure sits on a throne of carved ram's heads holding a scepter of rule and an orb of dominion in the other.

The Emperor is Sulphur in the Alchemical triad of Sulphur, Mercury, Salt.
Emperor.keywords: masculine, government, senior, of importance, structure, rationality, rules
Emperor.name: Emperor
Emperor.reversedKeywords: hot, passionate, impetuous, issue with authority, abuse of power
Emperor.title: Son of the Morning, chief among the Mighty

reversed.challenge: You may be raging against a machine that you need, least you would have nothing to rage against. Pull back on your resistance in areas that feel strained.
reversed.crowns: Breaking free from tradition, standards or ideals of the status quo.
reversed.future: Stay aware of others desires to influence you for their own benefit, don't be pressured into going along with anything that doesn't resonate with who you are and what you believe.
reversed.influences: Holy than thou, casting judgement based on personal beliefs and intolerance of individuality or being different.
reversed.outcome: Traditions will be broken, new ways of thinking will clash with the old.
reversed.past: You have been able to distance yourself from closed mindedness and prejudice.
reversed.root: You don't blindly follow rules or authority without questioning why, and trusting your instincts when something doesn't feel right.
reversed.self: You feel the need to challenge status quo, rebel against power and do things your own way. It's time to cut your own path and let go of restrictive beliefs that constrain your ideas.
reversed.situation: Harsh judgements based on rigid inflexibility in logic or by social norms keep conversations from being had.

upright.challenge: You are called to do great work, to master the laws of the Universe and to teach what you have learned to the neophytes in this course of study.
upright.crowns: The keys to the kingdom of heaven symbolize the spiritual knowledge and inspiration available to you.
upright.future: There is a strong influence of an individual that will explain everything for you. this could be equally a good or bad thing depending ion who they are.
upright.influences: Authority and servitude.
upright.outcome: Conviction to a higher-self sheds mercy.
upright.past: A past influenced by a strong belief system, bound by tradition and ceremony.
upright.root: Your authority and supreme status has been earned through devotion.
upright.self: You will find grounding in a traditional force in your life, be it religion, philosophy, or any other group of authority. This group or tradition serves you in many ways, inspirationally , with guidance on a path of ethics and virtue.
upright.situation: You paid your dues to earn respect, now you can apply your credentials toward higher aspirations.

Hierophant.description:
A figure sits on a throne above obedient kneeling and shaved heads, one hand raised, two fingers upright in a sign of peace, the other holding a gold staff with three cross rods one each for the Father, the Son and the Holy Ghost. He is the medieval Pope.

The Hierophant refers to a master, a shaman, the energy of this card points 
to a resource that can link consciousness to eternity.
Hierophant.name: Hierophant
Hierophant.reversedKeywords: inflexibility, biting the hand that feeds, cancel culture, prude
Hierophant.title: Magus of the Eternal Gods

reversed.challenge: Something is out of sync, either with others or within yourself. Itâ€™s time to take a full inventory of imbalances in your relationships. Ask yourself questions like what are my beliefs, why am I in this situation, do my beliefs align with my inner self or outwardly with others? How do your answers align with the way you live your life?
reversed.crowns: Tough choices need to be made, it takes a righteous heart to do the hard work of accepting the consequences.
reversed.future: Disharmony within yourself, possibly due to external forces which you have influenced. You will need to make a decision, prioritize doing the right thing and accepting all the consequences that come with it in order to regain your honor.
reversed.influences: Conflict with others, bad decisions being made without accountability, lack of communication either intentionally or due to apathy and depression.
reversed.outcome: Wake up and respect yourself for all that you are, forgive yourself for past transgressions that may have caused you or another pain, bring compassion into your actions not only for others but also yourself.
reversed.past: Inner conflict and disharmony have caused breaks in communication. Not being accountable for your actions only make things worse.
reversed.root: You're not reluctant to ignore a situation that is harmful, making tough decisions comes easily to you when you are supporting your morals and the greater good.
reversed.self: Feeling unbalanced and at war with yourself. Focus on your strengths and define what is important to you so that you can make better decisions in the future.
reversed.situation: Conflict, inner and outer are present. There is a gap in understanding something, somewhere, creating an imbalance. This situation needs to be reflected upon genuinely with honesty in order to become resolved.

upright.challenge: Honesty in communication with others or with yourself is key to building genuine and harmonious relationships. Unify dueling forces and resist the temptation of simple trappings.
upright.crowns: Trust, respect, devotion, commitment, compatibility and compassion.
upright.future: Relationships will be about subtle expression and communication. Cultivating your truth and making up your mind will be important.
upright.influences: Strong bonds are formed with partners that have no restraints or expectations, trust builds up over time, empowering everyone to be their authentic selves.
upright.outcome: Trials have been overcome, a passionate and loving, trusting relationship has formed, you can feel confident about your choices.
upright.past: Relationships were of natural development. Balanced communications, harmonious differences and secure finances were all present and available.
upright.root: You are capable of love, capable of a soul honoring connection that transcends time and place.
upright.self: Easily caught up in whirlwind of passion this is a time when you should choose love, love yourself, love others, stay true to your authentic self and you can unify even the most repellent forces with positive energy.
upright.situation: A situation of awareness, a reminder that balance is essential, "it takes two to Tango." In order to make good choices you have to know who you are and what you want.

Lovers.description:
A pair of unclothed figures stand under trees with their hands outstretched toward one another. The feminine figure stands before an apple tree with a serpent wound around its trunk, representing the temptation of sensual pleasure, and how such indulgences take away from devotion to the Divine. The masculine figure stands under a tree of 12 flames, representing the intense desires of men, the number 12 suggests the zodiacal signs, a symbol of time and eternity. 

Above them the Angel Raphael 
floats between the clouds of a volcanic eruption and the blazing sun, hands outstretched signifying healing blessings and reinforcing the Union of Love and The Divine. 

The Lovers represent the cleaving of one into two natures, or the coming together of two into one. The impact of inspiration on intuition, resulting in illumination and liberation.
Lovers.keywords: Love, harmony, alignment in values, making informed choices, partnerships
Lovers.lordOf: Children of the Voice Divine, The Oracles of the Mighty Gods
Lovers.name: Lovers
Lovers.reversedKeywords: self love, misalignment of values, detachment, trust issues
Lovers.title: Children of the Voice Divine, The Oracles of the Mighty Gods

reversed.challenge: You need to take back control, take steps that align your higher self with your current course of action. Focus on yourself and the things you have the power to control.
reversed.crowns: Using your personal energies to attend to yourself, being proactive so that when the time comes to act you will be ready.
reversed.future: Obstacles and challenges will require you to draw upon all your will to improve the situation. You may even experience a loss of power, do not worry about that now, focus on what you can do not what you can't do.
reversed.hope: Setting boundaries and sticking to them.
reversed.influences: Things are not progressing and it's time to ask yourself is there a deeper reason why this is happening, what lessons can be learned.
reversed.outcome: You have command over your destiny and you can make the changes once you have aligned yourself with some truth and perspective.
reversed.past: Holding onto things too tightly, learning to let go and be grateful for the experience.
reversed.root: You can remove obstacles by accepting that some things are out of your control and focusing on things you can control.
reversed.self: Feeling powerless, unmotivated to change or put in effort, circumstances might be frustrating but you have to make the change you want to see, only you can do this for yourself.
reversed.situation: Things are not going the way you had planned, it could be that you are letting things get in your way too easily or that you are trying too hard to control them. Whatever the reason this is a wake up call for you to take control of the situation and focus on what will get you what you want.

upright.challenge: Look upon a problem with a different perspective, consider skill, balance, determination and exertion of visible control of oneself as a way to command victoriously over the situation.
upright.crowns: Will power can accomplish anything, all barriers will fall before you if the ego is assertively controlled.
upright.future: You are assured a certain confidence, tremendous focus and drive will be a great source of pride and self satisfaction.
upright.influences: Challenges might be pulling you in opposite directions or testing your strength. Concentrate and don't cut corners for success.
upright.outcome: By this time you have developed a strong identity and mastery of your personality use that to triumph over your environment, assertive and visible control will be your success.
upright.past: An obsession or an issue of self identity attached to discipline, will-power, and over-achieving.
upright.root: Your vigorous ego allows you to feel swift in motion and at the peak of perfection, thereby you ride victoriously through your world commanding success.
upright.self: For the moment your self-assertive control is all that you might wish, you may not be able to see beyond your own ego and pride. Victory is only in your reach if you are able to follow through to the end.
upright.situation: Through discipline and will power you have developed the great inner control that is necessary to triumph over your environment.

Chariot.description:
The Chariot card is laced with celestial power and strength as it shows us a tall figure holding a scepter, crowned with stars and wearing a tunic with a square emblem on the breast. In front are two sphinx, one black one white, seemingly to pull in opposite directions. The charioteer need not hold reins instead they employ will power to steer where they want to go.

The figure is the symbol for the spirit of human controlling the lower principles, soul and body, while passing triumphantly through the astral plane, rising above illusion and penetrating the higher spheres.
Chariot.keywords: success, determination, control, victory, hard work and focus, transportation or travel
Chariot.name: Chariot
Chariot.reversedKeywords: lacking direction, powerless, obstacles, aggression, coercion
Chariot.title: Child of the Power of the Waters, Lord of Triumph of the Light

reversed.challenge: Channeling raw emotions toward positive aspects of life rather than repressing them and risk harmful uncontrolled outbursts.
reversed.crowns: Setbacks are temporary, you will find the inner resolve required to reinvigorate the situation.
reversed.future: Focus on the positive, spend time with people that treat you with respect and build you up, stay way from known energy drains.
reversed.hope: Expression over repression of raw emotion.
reversed.influences: Repressed feelings, explosive scenes clinical depression. Evidence from the past could be the answers to future questions, it will take inner strength but you must care for yourself first.
reversed.outcome: You may be delayed for a bit while you get your inner strength back, in the meantime be kind to yourself and rest to restore energy levels.
reversed.past: A regretful moment of weakness, loss of self control or a lashing out.
reversed.root: Your core strength will always be there for you, in times of doubt collect evidence from your past to overcome feelings of inadequacy.
reversed.self: You have let fear and anxiety affect your self esteem, now more than ever you must find that inner resolve to get back up and carry on.
reversed.situation: A vulnerable feeling, loss of motivation or suffering from a recent setback, now is a time to step back and restore energy levels by withdrawing temporarily.

upright.challenge: Having compassion and understanding is more effective than brute strength. Tame wild instincts and urges to coerce by force, settle your emotions and find inner calm before proceeding.
upright.crowns: Fueled by your own power and inner strength commitments are met regardless of support from others.
upright.future: You are aware you will always be met with challenges, however what makes them difficult or easy is the way you approach them.
upright.influences: Raw emotions can surface without fear or shame, loyal supporters will step up and be present when you need it.
upright.outcome: Take time to master your abilities, be patient and compassionate. Harmony in hearts can be realized and balance achieved.
upright.past: Courage was shown and obstacles were overcome as a result.
upright.root: The advantage of will power and inner strength is not visible to others, you have the ability to control a situation without excessive force when you maintain composure.
upright.self: Your strength gives you confidence to hold space for yourself and others when difficulties arise.
upright.situation: Strength is required for challenges ahead, rest assured that you've got what it takes on order to persevere. Allow yourself to feel the fear and overcome it all the same.

Strength.description: A feminine figure wearing white robes, crowned with an infinity symbol hovering over their head gently strokes the head of a lion whilst holding its jaw in the other hand. The lion symbolizes passion, its threatening mouth is kept closed not with strength but with loving kindness suggesting the figure has tamed the wild beast with their heart. This represents the mastery of the lower by the higher, the soul holds the body's passions in check.
Strength.keywords: inner strength, courage, influence, compassion, bravery
Strength.lordOf: Daughter of the Flaming Sword, Leader of the Lion
Strength.name: Strength
Strength.reversedKeywords: self doubt, vulnerability, low energy, raw emotion, lack of confidence
Strength.title: Daughter of the Flaming Sword, Leader of the Lion

reversed.challenge: At some point you need to make space in your life for others, let them in, rebuild relationships, make new ones if necessary, recognize the value of connecting with others even whilst on a spiritual journey.
reversed.crowns: A deeper understanding of self and purpose can be found in isolation.
reversed.future: Avoiding self reflection or resisting against being separated from someone or something. Search deep within yourself to find your way past the challenges ahead.
reversed.influences: It will be your responsibility to ask the questions that will bring clarity in this situation.
reversed.outcome: It's a good time to reintegrate with people and things you have been away from. You're ready to explore and activate again.
reversed.past: A period of absence or withdrawal from others.
reversed.root: You can rebuild yourself at a spiritual level with introspection and meditation.
reversed.self: Feeling shy or apprehensive about a social scene or work situation, possibly as a result of an unwelcome isolation or separation event.
reversed.situation: Some type of isolation that is not bringing peace as it should. Possibly a fear of separation in a relationship or a mental health event that has caused withdrawal needs to be reconciled or it may be time to explore alternate paths forward.

upright.challenge: Now may be a moment for you to tell everyone to leave you alone, you need more seclusion and time to assimilate and process.
upright.crowns: An ability to use isolation and the knowledge you gain from it as a tool to think things through on your path to even higher levels of consciousness.
upright.future: You will be going through a comfortable phase of seclusion, while stopping to take a break from daily life, ask yourself if the path you're on still has as much meaning as it did when you began.  Allow yourself to perceive who you are, it will be a time of heightened perception.
upright.influences: The power and authority that belongs to pilgrims, saints and priests surrounds you as you have relegated yourself to a temporary yet austere solitude.
upright.outcome: While you posses the gift of seeing, and even further understanding the deeper issues in this matter, you will need some private time to to consider what steps you will take from here.
upright.past: You went through a phase of seclusion, where you shielded yourself from outside influences, a time of repose and peace. You were able to see who you really are.
upright.root: Your need to find a deeper truth is what you are looking for when you are alone with your feelings and motivations. In time you may seek a teacher or guide.
upright.self: You are distancing yourself from the regular routine world in order to gain a deeper insight. You may be reevaluating your personal goals or just raising your vibration to enhance your consciousness.
upright.situation: You should take each step with deliberate approach, purposefully removing yourself from external chatter. You are going through an important experience within yourself that is allowing you to perceive who you are, what you want, and how you can get there. This is a time for depth of experience and heights of perception found when you are able to be alone with yourself.

Hermit.description:
The initiate and eternal seeker wrapped in a hood, carrying a staff and lantern represent the Pilgrim Soul on the Path toward spiritual enlightenment and awareness. 

Having reached the top of a mountain the ground is covered in snow, suggesting accomplishment and mastery of skill to reach the peak. The lamp encases a six rayed star, the Seal of Solomon, to light the way just a few steps ahead at a time. Not knowing what is beyond the illuminated path the seeker holds a long staff to guide and balance as they navigate toward the unknown.
Hermit.keywords: spiritual enlightenment, soul searching, solitude, inner guidance
Hermit.name: Hermit
Hermit.title: The Magus of the Voice of Light, The Prophet of the Gods

reversed.challenge: Forces you cannot control are working against you right now, they will retreat soon enough, as long as you can relinquish the notion of having any control. Let go and accept your fate, forgive yourself and move on.
reversed.crowns: Through self awareness and sometimes difficult introspection you can break free from negative cycles that have been present in your life, even if they have been there for a long time.
reversed.future: What goes around comes around, what you gave is what you can expect to get.
reversed.influences: Sudden deterioration of a relationship can leave you feeling powerless or out of control. This is not the case however, you always have power to choose your own actions.
reversed.outcome: Destiny starts with accepting responsibility for where you are now, it's up to you and the Universe at this point, trust your heart.
reversed.past: There was likely something you could have done differently that would have changed the situation that you are in now. This has been a learning experience for you.
reversed.root: Despite change feeling like a disruption at times, you can always choose to learn from experiences and improve your situation. Take hold of your own destiny by letting go of a need to be on control.
reversed.self: You may be resisting change that you think is being forced upon you, or otherwise out of your control. There is always something that can be done in situations like this, learn from them. Take control by accepting your fate this time, there will be another day to make a change you wanted.
reversed.situation: Not the best situation to be, luck running out, unwelcome changes being made, mental stress worrying about things that are inevitable, you may also be unconsciously trying to repress thoughts or feelings causing self harm.

upright.challenge: The nature of Fate is the fabric of our existence, it is a cyclical force beyond our comprehension. The only power we have is in our personal interpretations and actions of good or bad intention, as the the Wheel continues to turn beyond our control.
upright.crowns: Opportunities that you could never imagine will be made available to you when you tune into your intuition and go with the flow.
upright.future: Keep your mind open to synchronicities and signs from the Universe and you will not only be exactly where you're supposed to be, doing exactly what you're supposed to be doing, you will know it.
upright.influences: What you have sent out to the Universe has come back to you.
upright.outcome: How do you feel about luck? Anything can happen when this card appears in this position, it's up to you and the Universe at this point, trust your gut.
upright.past: Ever changing cycles are part of this life, we have to accept them as a process and let them go to make way for new turns of the Wheel.
upright.root: Abundance and good fortune are drawn to you when you meditate and visualize, you know that the Universe is there to provide and that miracles happen everyday.
upright.self: Accept that sometimes things just happen. Fate, destiny, a reason for everything isn't always apparent to you, but its there.
upright.situation: An unexpected event is in the works, generally positive changes will occur as a result although even good things sometimes take time to adjust to.

Wheel of Fortune.description:
The Wheel is the revolution of experience and progress, the steps of the Zodiac, the revolving staircase, held in place by the counterchanging influence of dark and light, time and eternity. 

The Tetragrammaton YHVH inscribed on the Wheel between the letters TARO, or ROTA, or backwards as TORA. Inside are the alchemical symbols for mercury, sulphur and salt. 

Presided over by the Plutonian cynocephalus (dog headed beast) below and the Sphinx of Egypt above, as a serpent, representing life force, plunges down into the material world along the side of the Wheel.

The four corners of the card are inhabited by the four signs of the Zodiac that represent the neutral elementals as winged creatures; Air represented by a human is Aquarius; Water represented by an eagle is Scorpio; Fire represented by a lion is Leo; Earth represented by a bull or ox is Taurus.
Wheel of Fortune.keywords: fate, soulmates, karma, destiny, chance, fortune, change
Wheel of Fortune.name: Wheel of Fortune
Wheel of Fortune.reversedKeywords: bad luck, unwelcome change, resistance to change, breaking a cycle
Wheel of Fortune.title: The Lord of the Forces of Life

reversed.challenge: Stop trying to dodge the bullet and own up to your actions. An unwillingness to look beyond your own ego and fears will only impede your own growth and freedom.
reversed.crowns: Once you acknowledge your own mistakes you can accept self compassion and work toward making right any wrongs you may have done to others.
reversed.future: Unaccepted consequences of past actions continue to linger in guilt and denial.
reversed.hope: Shine a light on injustice and dishonesty.
reversed.influences: Examine those around you for prejudice and bias.
reversed.outcome: You may feel that you have been wronged, unfairly judged or blamed for something out of your control, even if you didn't have anything to do with it take this experience as an opportunity to learn and grow, accept what happened and move on.
reversed.past: You know you have done something unjust or immoral, you can hide it and hope no one finds out or own up to it and accept the consequences of your actions.
reversed.root: You can asses your own actions and and make personal judgements to correct wrong doings when mistakes have been made without beating yourself up. Humans make mistakes, you are human.
reversed.self: Your inner critic may be a little too critical right now. Accept yourself for all that you are, acknowledge  what could be improved and change what you can as you are able.
reversed.situation: You have a choice to make that you will have to live with on your conscience for some time. If you're being dishonest with yourself about this situation you will miss the bigger picture and become destined to repeat your mistakes.

upright.challenge: Take responsibility be straight forward and to the point. If the situation is not as clear cut as it first appears, be ready to challenge your own beliefs while seeking the truth.
upright.crowns: You can cut down all illusions and expose the heart of the matter for what it is. Moderation on all things keep you on solid ground and allow you to create an emotional balance.
upright.future: The truth will come out, depending on past actions this could be a good thing or a bad one for you, in either case you will learn a lot about yourself and others.
upright.influences: Unbiased and fair.
upright.outcome: Self examination may be uncomfortable but it is for the best, you have a chance to change your behavior now for a better future.
upright.past: Settling things in a rational manner. Knowing the choices you make will have a long and lasting impact on your well being.
upright.root: You are confronted by the results of your actions, be they good or bad. If you behave your actions will be recognized, but if you try to take advantage you will fail.
upright.self: You use means of excessive severity when holding yourself accountable for your actions. Allow yourself the same level of compassion you would give to a friend.
upright.situation: A favorable omen if you are involved in a dispute that a fair and balanced resolution will be made soon. You may be finding yourself compelled to act or speak out against an unjust situation now more than ever, try staying even and neutral as events unfold.

Justice.description:
The figure of Justice sits in front of the familiar pillars that resemble Boaz and Joachim, the pillars at Solomon's Temple that represent the outer pillars on the Tree of Life, Severity and Mercy. Harmony, the third pillar in the middle, is in essence whatever passes through them.

In the right hand of Justice is a double edged sword, indicating consequences come with our actions. In the left hand a scale also indicating checks and balances are in place to uphold the law.

Just behind the figure, hanging between the pillars, is a thin purple veil, signifying the "veil of ignorance" that must be employed to hide certain specific facts from ones own mind that could introduce biases while making an impartial decision, to stick only to the relevant facts at hand and to leave out cultural opinions.

A tip of a white shoe peaks from below the robes worn by Justice as a reminder of the spiritual consequences of our actions.

Nephthys, the third aspect of Luna, the twin sister of Isis.
Justice.keywords: justice, karma, consequence, accountability, law, truth, honesty, integrity, cause and effect
Justice.name: Justice
Justice.reversedKeywords: injustice, retribution, dishonesty, corruption, unfairness, avoiding accountability
Justice.title: Daughter of the Lord of Truth, The Holder of the Balances

reversed.challenge: You may have been giving 110% when only 60% would ever be recognized in the current circumstance. Don't fight this fact just flow with it and let go of personal attachment to it.
reversed.crowns: In this position, this card has no positive meanings. Your best move right now is walking away from whatever it is that is taking advantage of you.
reversed.future: You will come to realize that you aren't getting your due, you will need to make up your mind and take a side, before decisions are made for you.
reversed.hope: A standstill for an indefinite amount of time
reversed.influences: Stalling for time
reversed.outcome: You've been waiting to 100% ready, but that will never happen, it's time now, get out there are do it.
reversed.past: You lost a specific amount of time sacrificing for something that never fulfilled you the way it should have.
reversed.root: You have been on hold before and you are content to wait around some more, you may have had a break through recently or are ready to make some changes to move forward.
reversed.self: Accept that other people are essential to having a rich life, you may be held back through association sometimes, making sacrifices for principles might make you outcast but you know its worth it.
reversed.situation: You are starting to realize that you aren't getting anywhere and could be wasting your time and effort.

upright.challenge: Suspend all expectations and actions, something new may be emerging, shift your energy and allow energies to materialize for you.
upright.crowns: Simply "be" allow things to flow.
upright.future: Crossroads before you, your thoughts have bubbled up to a loss of decision, lay still answers will come.
upright.hope: Surrender of mind and body to universal flow.
upright.influences: No expectations
upright.outcome: Gain of higher-self, enlightenment.
upright.past: Giving up things that do not serve you, walking a more spiritual path and seeking enlightenment.
upright.root: You gain perspective by identifying habits that you cling to and which hinder your progress.
upright.self: The more you struggle and rage against your circumstances, the tighter your knots will be.
upright.situation: You are stuck in a dilemma, suspended between past and future, you cannot do anything about it now, it has already been done.  A state of purposeful, complete surrender may be necessary to for you to become more spiritually attuned, and take your time to make the right decisions from here.

Hanged Man.description:
A figure is suspended from a living tree by their right foot, left foot is bent 90 degrees at the knee, both arms are bound behind their back forming a triangle, the figure resembles the symbol of Jupiter turned upside down. The hanged figure has a calm serene look upon their face and a halo around their head indicating that they are in the position they are in by choice, there is nothing to do now but to endure passing time. 

They are wearing red pants representing passion, while the blue shirt represents having qualities of calm emotions, the yellow color of shoes, hair and halo symbolize possessing higher intellect.

An elusive, because a profoundly significant symbol it is sacrifice - the submergence of the higher into the lower in order to sublimate the lower. It is the descent of spirit into matter, the incarnation of God in man, the submission to the bonds of matter that the material may be transcended and transmuted.
Hanged Man.keywords: surrender, new perspectives, enlightenment through conscious choice
Hanged Man.name: Hanged Man
Hanged Man.reversedKeywords: delays, resistance, disinterest, stalling, career move not working
Hanged Man.title: The Spirit of the Mighty Waters

reversed.challenge: Fighting passing time will only cause regret, be open to change the most difficult parts of your self.
reversed.crowns: While you may still be afraid of the unknown you can trust that all things are happening as they should, all things change, nothing stays the same forever.
reversed.future: You can choose to let go or the universe will force it to go where it's supposed to be, which could be distressing.
reversed.hope: Surrender the past, let it go completely.
reversed.influences: If you don't do it the universe will. Whatever it is you're afraid only has potential to get worse if you don't own it and take control for yourself.
reversed.outcome: As long as you resist you will remain stuck in limbo. Allow new energy to flow and subtle shifts can change any outcome.
reversed.past: Personal and private transformation, staying out of view until you've had a chance to purge what no longer serves you.
reversed.root: You are quick to recognize what needs to change in order to move on.
reversed.self: You're resisting a change that is important for you, feel empowered to make that change happen, know that when one door is closed another is opened.
reversed.situation: Is it worth staying in your current situation indefinitely or is it time to make some changes?

upright.challenge: Find the beginning in the end, transformation starts there.
upright.crowns: You are experiencing a kind of metamorphosis that entails a destruction of the old. Discarding your usual patterns and paradigms will allow the transformation to take place.
upright.future: Promise of new hope means you may have to endure a few stinging thorns.
upright.influences: It's best not to resist sweeping changes, even when made suddenly, it will only make a transition more difficult.
upright.outcome: Not an end just a motion in a different direction.
upright.past: Sweeping change that feels like upheaval, if you refuse to let go, the harder it will be to embrace new opportunities.
upright.root: Where there is an ending, there is also a beginning, you can put behind you aspects you have outgrown.
upright.self: In order to move forward in alignment with the universe, one must call an end to the past, let go and be done with it.
upright.situation: Circumstances are dragging on far too long, the only way to make a clean break is to have a sharp ending.

Death.description:
Death rides a white horse wearing black armor, carrying a black flag with a white five petal rose, the number five represents change, the color white symbolizes purity. Beneath the feet of Death's horse are laying all classes of humans in the dirt, Death does not differentiate between the rich and the poor, the pious or the wicked.  In the background a boat floats down a river as the sun sets between two towers. 

There is beauty in death, it is an equal and inherent quality of being alive shared by all of nature. The sign of transmutation and disintegration. 

The skeleton which survived the destructive power of time, may be regarded as the foundation upon which the structure is built, the type which persists through the permutations of time and space, adaptable to the requirements of evolution and yet radically unchanged; the transmuting power of Nature working from below upwards.
Death.keywords: sudden change, transition, ending, new beginning
Death.name: Death
Death.reversedKeywords: resisting change, fear of progress, repetitive bad behavior
Death.title: The Child of the Great Transformers, Lord of the Gates of Death

reversed.challenge: Break the cycle of negative thinking or over indulgence, allow for all things in moderation.
reversed.crowns: Healing possibilities are open to you when you align with the universe and feel the flow of life.
reversed.future: An opportunity to align your higher vibration with the physical world. Given that this is the reversal card it's very likely that this will be a personal event known only to you when it occurs.
reversed.hope: Getting a wake up call from balance and harmony.
reversed.influences: Your environment may be changing abruptly and it's time for you to realign your habits and routines to match up with the expectations of the outer world.
reversed.outcome: Lack of long term plans will be your undoing. Think about what you need to change to make the balance required.
reversed.past: Lack of long term vision left you feeling unfulfilled and missing the bigger picture.
reversed.root: Behaving recklessly or clashing with others creating drama.
reversed.self: Pay attention to that inner voice when it's telling you something isn't 100% right. Trust yourself to feel the difference.
reversed.situation: Too much is never enough and can lead to seeking gratification in dangerous ways. Dig deep to the root of why excess feels best right now.

upright.challenge: Moderation in all things cultivates a clear mind and calm heart needed to maintain balance.
upright.crowns: Adaptability and maintaining a positive perspective on things makes it easier to move along without being dragged into drama or conflict.
upright.future: It's always a good thing to re-examine priorities, however avoid extreme changes at all costs. Subtle shifts are needed to take place in order to support harmonious change.
upright.hope: Serenity through balance, patience and moderation.
upright.influences: Patterns, take them to find a good balance, recognize the universe nudging you toward peaceful serenity.
upright.outcome: Finding peace in knowing who you are, aspirations and goals unfold before you when you're on the right path.
upright.past: Going with the "flow" finding the right mix, keeping in motion
upright.root: The "flow" is your source of power, cleansing your energy providing you with peace. Aspirations are always within reach when you know who you are, what you want and why.
upright.self: You feel deeply settled into your identity and morals, knowing who you are is a source of strength that no one can deny you.
upright.situation: Tranquil waters are running through your spirit, a healing is in need or is taking place, you are learning to temper your ego with your spiritual needs, this is a time of inner growth.

Temperance.description:
An Angel floats with one foot slightly dipped in the water and the other barely touching the ground, holding in each of its two hands cups with water freely flowing between them. 

The Angel's robe is embroidered with a triangle enclosed in a square representing humanity bound to Earth. In the background is a winding path toward the sun representing the journey of a human life toward a higher consciousness.
Temperance.name: Temperance
Temperance.title: Daughter of the Reconcilers, The Bringer Forth of Life

reversed.challenge: Relax, if you're upset find a way to laugh at the object of your frustrations, switch up the attitude that is holding you back.
reversed.crowns: Enter into a Buddhist principle of detachment, no longer tethered to a desire for material things or societal concepts like fame, wealth or fashion.
reversed.future: You will be confronted with you inner most self, self confidence and courage are needed to integrate those into your life.
reversed.influences: Toxic destructive behavior, alluring at first.
reversed.outcome: How is it the greatest lie ever told is able to exist? Fear. If you can't separate projections from reality you won't be able to tame fear, your own or others.
reversed.past: You broke free from the bonds of past personal experiences and left that baggage behind you.
reversed.root: Curb your perverse sense of humor and stop creating chaos for your own amusement, it may end up costing you in the long run.
reversed.self: You realize what things have become toxic and it's your choice to face it.
reversed.situation: You have seen through the deceptions and are now free to do whatever you want without regard to former attachments.

upright.challenge: Control your urges and base desires, break free from negative cycles.
upright.crowns: Lower level energy is dispelled when we carry the light in our hearts and minds. Acknowledging lower level energies in your conscious awareness is the first step toward freeing yourself from any negative behaviors that have become routine.
upright.future: You realize you have already dropped to a level of functioning that is beneath you.
upright.hope: Love and acceptance can never be gained because they are always yours.
upright.influences: Material bondage has penetrated every level of human decency, tolerance of criticism leads to manipulation, addiction leads to violence there are no bounds.
upright.outcome: The material world seduces with lust for physical pleasure, discretion should be used in personal and business matters.
upright.past: A very loud message that you are giving up your control to base nature.
upright.root: There is no darkness, only absence of light. You are able to find the essence of nature in everything, no matter how repugnant.
upright.self: You operate under the illusion that love and acceptance must be obtained at all costs. Be careful not to lose yourself in someone else, set and maintain healthy boundaries, even with family and soulmates.
upright.situation: Feeling trapped or powerless, like things are out of control and you're a victim. Truth might be that you're just allowing yourself to believe that because it's easier than owning it.

Devil.description:
There are two great controlling forces in life, destructive and reproductive, dynamic and static, lower life forms of the physical world are bound to creation, hence the chains, fear of change is what stabilizes their life force. If you look closely you begin to realize that the bondage is loose and could easily be slipped overhead. Both figures have small horns protruding indicating how much like the devil they are becoming the longer they refuse to free themselves.

Baphomet represents balance between good and evil, male and female, and human and animal. With Vampire bat wings and an hypnotizing stare leaves one feeling victimized. Above him is the inverted pentagram, indicating the physical material is higher than the spirit.
Devil.keywords: addiction, mental health issues, sexuality, dependency, materialism
Devil.name: Devil
Devil.reversedKeywords: loneliness, misunderstood, outcast, release from bondage
Devil.title: The Lord of the Gates of Matter, The Child of the Forces of Time

reversed.challenge: Wether you admit it or not you are resisting change, know that it will force it's way into your life no matter how much you run.
reversed.crowns: You will be forewarned or have an intuitive sense that something is about to happen before you are forced to become involved or make a decision.
reversed.future: Growth and transformation, the amount of upheaval it causes will be exceeded by the rewards it brings.
reversed.hope: Spiritual awakening, questioning your beliefs and the meaning of life at its most fundamental level.
reversed.influences: Overly sentimental for the old ways and archaic beliefs that aren't healthy for you or others.
reversed.outcome: Living under false pretenses, pretending about something that inevitably will breakdown.  Itâ€™s time to realize whatever it was that you relied upon is already gone and move on.
reversed.past: You experienced tremendous growth by questioning who you are, what you believe and if you can change.
reversed.root: You can feel the crisis coming, no matter how much you try and avoid it, it will happen. Deep down you realize it is for the best and so you must allow it to happen.
reversed.self: Calling everything into question, even yourself.
reversed.situation: You are going through a life change that you initiated, you may discover a new you on this path, trust in the process.

upright.challenge: Admit to problems before they blindside you, if they already have nurture yourself as best you can and learn from those lessons.
upright.crowns: You will be very in tune with your intuition during a time of pain and turmoil you can trust your instinct.
upright.future: Take head of warning and examine your life, you may be able to save yourself some grief in the future.
upright.influences: The environment requires perspective and timing, avoid saying things in haste, perform damage control if necessary, and get confirmations on even the smallest of agreements.
upright.outcome: Very sudden, not so pleasant, change is a universal wake up call to get you out of the fog you've been in. Realize that life is happening for you, not to you.
upright.past: All the signs had been around you, you refused to admit the problem.
upright.root: You've experienced upheaval before, you can nurture yourself and learn from the lessons.
upright.self: Getting stuck in an unhealthy rut, allowing things to go on underneath your nose.
upright.situation: There's something you're not paying attention to that is going to force you to do a reality check.

Tower.description:
A large castle built upon a mountain top is struck by lightening, violently knocking off the roof, resembling a crown, illustrating how energy flows down from the universe through one's own root chakra. To either side of the tower are 22 flames, representing the 12 zodiac plus the 10 sephiroth on the tree of life, representing divine intervention which is present at all times, even in disaster.

The tower is solid yet people leap from the windows indicating that the tower was built upon shaky ground.
Tower.name: Tower
Tower.title: Lord of the Hosts of the Mighty

reversed.challenge: Trust that you are a vessel of Divinity, have confidence in yourself.
reversed.crowns: An opportunity to realign your life with what your spirit wants.
reversed.future: Take time out for yourself, relax and replenish your spirit.
reversed.hope: Reconnect with what makes you truly happy.
reversed.influences: A feeling of lost hope or faith in humanity, possibly from illness or a history of bad luck, the energy to make progress is in dire need of replenishment.
reversed.outcome: The only way you won't be forced to take time out is if you choose self care.
reversed.past: You have lost your confidence, faith and whatever connection you once seemed to have that made you feel hopeful.
reversed.root: You realize that a confrontation doesnâ€™t always result in unfavorable outcomes. Knowing there is always the possibility that your faith is being tested, trust in yourself to take the appropriate actions and the universe will respond in kind. If you are experiencing a loss of confidence take time to replenish your spirit with self care in a form that can be brought into your daily life as a reminding ritual that honors and fortifies the vessel of life, your soul.
reversed.self: You are feeling defeated by yourself, trapped in a vicious cycle of fear and doubt, you are losing hope in ever being able to move forward.
reversed.situation: Overwhelmed or blind sided, the Universe is really reaching out and touching you right now.

upright.challenge: Your goals are on track, but to realize them know that you must take positive action.
upright.crowns: The guidance you receive is filled with blissful peace, and rejuvenating blessings,which fill your own higher-consciousness.
upright.future: Assurance that each one of your days are to be saturated with promise of joy, truth and love.
upright.influences: Higher powers are present, offering healing waters, hope and serenity. Reflect on the guidance surrounding you for personal power in knowing yourself.
upright.outcome: This card is an affirmation that there is hope, be at peace and know all is well, you are on the right path, relax and it will all work out.
upright.past: You have been part of a cleansing process of peaceful being and affirmations of hope, you have made the changes for spiritual growth and you are ready to share your wealth with others.
upright.root: One thing you understand is the transformative powers of the Divine spirit. Be your authentic self, open your heart to others without fear. When you resonate with pure peaceful lovingness your mental abilities and strength of calmness within, bring you fresh perspectives and new ideas can flourish.
upright.self: Involvement with a hyper natural guiding force has shaped your perspectives on all things concerned.  Following a traumatic event you are able to see past the pain and build inner strength.
upright.situation: There is a fine line between self-delusion and inspiration when considering the art of intuition, listen to your inner voices and trust Spirit as Spirit entrusts you with an expanded view of your original nature in this world.

Star.description:
A feminine figure is kneeling, vulnerable and unclothed, before a waters edge. In each hand is held a vessel of water, each being poured out. From the right into the water, representing the unconscious mind, and from the left onto the earth, diverging into five runoff streams, representing the conscious mind and its connection to the five senses. 

In the sky one large star, representing the core essence of a human being, surrounded by seven smaller ones representing the chakras of the human body.
Star.keywords: hope, inspiration, positivity, faith, renewal, healing, rejuvenation
Star.name: Star
Star.reversedKeywords: hopelessness, despair, negativity, lack of faith, despondent
Star.title: Daughter of the Firmament, Dweller between the Waters

reversed.challenge: Listen to your inner voice, not someone else.
reversed.crowns: Trust that the answers are within you, tune into your intuition for guidance.
reversed.future: You will receive guidance through intuition or other forms of psychic phenomena.
reversed.hope: Tune into yourself to hear the answer.
reversed.influences: Limiting beliefs, fear, doubt, anxiety.
reversed.outcome: When you work through your fears you will be free.
reversed.past: Negative energies have been influencing you, but now you can be free of these anxieties and fears.
reversed.root: Trying to push back fear doesn't work and you know it, you know how to face things head on.
reversed.self: You know if you tune into yourself your path will lit.
reversed.situation: You may be receiving signals either you don't know what they mean or you don't know where they are coming from or both. Pay attention to the subconscious world for messages in your dreams, random thoughts or recognizable coincidences.

upright.challenge: Allow the unusual into your life, use to inspire and enchant your imagination.
upright.crowns: Intuitive clarity comes from your reflective light, which you can use to determine best thoughts or actions.
upright.future: Look at your influences as you may find your self feeling very confused.
upright.influences: Luminary, stimulating the imagination, feeling disoriented.
upright.outcome: You must be vigilant in unraveling your thoughts, to see clearly what is causing you to move in a certain direction.
upright.past: You were more in touch with premonitions and desires, painful memories and fears have not allowed you to trust any longer. Turn those negative thoughts into constructive actions and clarity will return.
upright.root: You are constantly aware of what is influencing you, but your illusive guide may be just as much hindrance as it is help.
upright.self: Not using your intuitive side.
upright.situation: Sometimes a signal that you are lost, wandering aimlessly, or suffering internal anxieties and fear.

Moon.description:
A winding path is seen leading to, or from, a watery pond from which a crawfish is seen climbing up and onto the path. On each side of the path, also at the water's edge, is a wolf and a dog, one wild, one tame. In the distance are two towers, indicating possible destinations for the path. This card represents the duality of the conscious and subconscious mind, the thoughts we have and the choices we make. 

You are represented by the crawfish in this card. Climbing out of the water, having only the moon's light to help you perceive what lays ahead, you must use your own intuition to guide you through the darkness.
Moon.name: Moon
Moon.title: Ruler of Flux and Reflux, Child of the Sons of the Mighty

reversed.challenge: Ask yourself if you are you being overly confident, or egotistical.
reversed.crowns: You will have everything you need to succeed.
reversed.future: The path forward is not clear, there is too much distortion to make an accurate assessment.
reversed.influences: Overly enthusiastic and optimistic.
reversed.outcome: You will realize how wonderful life can be when you learn to let go.
reversed.past: Past experiences have damaged your enthusiasm.
reversed.root: Obstacles are easily removed with effort, you've known that all along.
reversed.self: You're finding it hard to justify the use of your energy here, you need to understand the positive aspects or what's to gain first.
reversed.situation: You no longer enjoy what you are doing.

upright.challenge: Allow greatness to stand out and finally you will be able to see and understand all that is happening.
upright.crowns: Brilliance, clarity, enlightenment.
upright.future: You will be successful at all that you undertake.
upright.influences: Inevitable presence of life giving power.
upright.outcome: Trust that your way is always illuminated by the sun and there is no need to fear the darkness.
upright.past: You've come out of the dark, had a breakthrough.
upright.root: You've already come to a point of clarity, you are enlightened.
upright.self: You feel cheerful, confident and ready to undertake new beginnings and make positive changes. Total confidence makes you predictable, you feel a great deal of enthusiasm and don't seem to be worried about the outcome.
upright.situation: Breakthrough brings clarity, trust, new understanding and beginnings.

Sun.description:
A naked child, innocent and joyous, upon a white horse, pure and spirited. Above shines a radiant sun with tall sunflowers in bloom.

The Sun card is optimistic, full of energy, nothing to hide and feeling fulfilled.
Sun.keywords: positivity, vitality, fun, glory, gain, truth
Sun.name: Sun
Sun.title: Lord of the Fire of the World

reversed.challenge: Overcome your biggest critic, yourself. Acknowledge that this part of you exists, listen to what it has to say, and move on knowing everything will be just fine.
reversed.crowns: The Universe will invite you to something bigger.
reversed.future: Inner secrets that you have kept hidden may be hold you back if you can't find acceptance in your heart.
reversed.influences: Others are negatively influenced by your standards and perfectionism.
reversed.outcome: You will forgive yourself and begin a self reflection process with fresh perspective.
reversed.past: You played it safe in the past, you didn't try anything new or step up in order to remain comfortable.
reversed.root: The universe calls to you, self doubt, guilt or fear have kept you from answering, but the call never goes away.
reversed.self: You have doubts about the situation causing you to lose momentum.
reversed.situation: A moment to self reflection, a repose from what feels safe and comfortable.

upright.challenge: Doubt yourself and you doubt everything you see, judge yourself and you see judges everywhere, learn your truth and decisions will come with ease.
upright.crowns: Knowledge of truth is your power and when you imbibe it with a fully opened mind you become most powerful.
upright.future: You will be inspired at your crossroads to lift yourself and transform, if you listen to the sound of your own voice, you can rise above doubt and judgement, and you can see forever.
upright.influences: There is an audible calling for you to rise out of your complacency, it could come as a divine intervention or an inner voice which is urging you to move on.
upright.outcome: The best way to make a transformation is to be honest with your self, this is the only way you can hear, and listen to, your highest powers of judgement.
upright.past: Higher energies are in motion so that you can transform and move on to a new phase of life, have faith.
upright.root: You understand how a balanced mind provides the clarity to hear the invigorating inner voices and to find the inspiration to answer to life's callings, you know how to use your truth.
upright.self: Judgement plays a part in your everyday life, honesty and love are the basis of your virtue,  possibly you have forgotten that in this matter?
upright.situation: It is a time to listen to the sound of your own voice with self honesty, you can make the decisions necessary to rise up to challenges and embrace your life.

Judgment.description:
Grey figures rise from graves, arm up stretched, as the Archangel Gabriel blows the final trumpet, the tidal wave is approaching.

The symbolism of dead rising from graves is connected to the idea of the final judgement of the Universe, the tidal wave indicates that this is unavoidable.
Judgment.name: Judgment
Judgment.reversedKeywords: self loathing, stagnation, ignoring the call, no appeal
Judgment.title: The Spirit of the Primal Fire

reversed.challenge: Something is missing in your life, you have to pick up the pieces and figure out what is keeping you from feeling whole and authentic.
reversed.crowns: Re-energized your mind's eye can find the right path.
reversed.future: You may go through the motions of success, but true fulfillment will elude you.
reversed.influences: All the pieces may be there but they do not fit together.
reversed.outcome: Something that you think should happen won't until an essential element is worked out, wether it's the completion of a project, closure on an emotional issue, or an attachment to a past relationship, frustrating delays will challenge you, but they only make a victory sweeter.
reversed.past: Taking shortcuts, not doing all the work 100%.
reversed.root: You know that accomplishments in and of themselves are empty if they are not connected to the raising up of others'.
reversed.self: Closure and fulfillment may still elude you.
reversed.situation: Success is just out of reach, there is something now allowing you to focus on getting what you want right now.

upright.challenge: Are you ready for your time of glory? Balance and unity will help you work out differences to your advantage so that all things can work as one.
upright.crowns: Enlightenment is the achievement of an absolute balance of self-enrichment and soul-fulfillment attained through sacred knowledge and cosmic consciousness.
upright.future: You will be rewarded with a success.
upright.influences: Sacred knowledge of the world and it's infinite balance and unity.
upright.outcome: This is a highly auspicious card, it is foretelling you that World is a promise of success, and a reminder that the highest value in life is the condition of your own soul.
upright.past: Working out differences using balance and unity to your advantage.
upright.root: You are assured of the infinite rewards of the world when you make positive efforts to improve yourself and those around you, to make the world a better place.
upright.self: A glowing success, achievement and wholeness are yours.
upright.situation: You are feeling the benefits of success right now. Be sure to repay the honors of time with gratitude, reflection and repose before taking on your next challenge.

Universe.description: The Universe depicted as a large green wreath, reminiscent of the serpent eating its own tail, symbolizing infinity. At the center gracefully floats an angelic figure, wrapped in flowing silk, holding a wand in each hand. In each of the four corners are the archetype zodiacal elements representing the stability and equilibrium present in Universal law.
Universe.keywords: completion, achievement, fulfillment, sense of belonging, wholeness, harmony
Universe.name: Universe
Universe.reversedKeywords: lack of closure, lack of achievement, feeling incomplete, emptiness
Universe.title: The Great One of the Night of Time

reversed.challenge: You are experiencing delays getting a hold of your wants and desires, don't let your emotions control you.
reversed.crowns: Inconsistent energy and delays has you resistant to changing.
reversed.future: Even though things may turn out your way, you are underwhelmed or disinterested.
reversed.influences: A lack of freedom, or stability, it's difficult to predict what could happen next. Unknown factors or players.
reversed.outcome: Be vigilant and aware, if something doesn't fit or feel right, it's likely to go wrong.
reversed.past: You had a sense of what was coming, but you didn't know how you would best fit into it. You struggled to define yourself and ended up exhausted rather than focused.
reversed.root: You can roll with the punches, you know when one door is closed another one opens to keep you moving forward.
reversed.self: It's a thumbs down for you, a hard pass, don't go overboard with precautions, but do trust your instincts.
reversed.situation: Weighed down by responsibility you are not able to move the needle as much as you feel you need to right now. Take a rest and be patient.

upright.challenge: With great power comes great responsibility, ask yourself, are your wants and desires controlling you?
upright.crowns: A breakthrough moment of clarity and creative insight.
upright.future: A fateful act that could be pivotal in the creation of something you have been desiring, stay open and aware!
upright.influences: Creative forces are all around you, they have the ability to grow if you act on them.
upright.outcome: Victory is at hand you will now be re-energized, optimism, willpower and fulfillment of your inner self will be developed.
upright.past: The Ace of Wands is symbolic of the initiative, courage and enthusiasm you had, as well as your willingness to take risks, sometimes this can be an indication of impetuousness in an emotional state.
upright.root: Strength of willpower and internal creative powers are not things you can learn, you were born with these innate gifts.
upright.self: You have more than enough motivation and grit to get things started, ambition bites the nails of success and you know it.
upright.situation: This card marks the beginning of a new direction, a breakthrough moment, you feel motivated and excited about an idea.

Ace of Wands.description: A hand issues a phallic wand of sprouting  wood, above a rich fertile landscape, indicate the Universal powers of creation. In the distance is a castle indicating the future opportunities will be available. It symbolizes a Natural Force, Strength, Vigor and Energy.
Ace of Wands.keywords: inspiration, enthusiasm, creative spark, will, force, strength
Ace of Wands.name: Ace of Wands
Ace of Wands.reversedKeywords: distractions, delays, possible emerging idea, blockage, mistakes, vexation, cancellation
Ace of Wands.title: Root Powers of Fire

reversed.challenge: You have to step it up and take some risks else you may not get what it is you want.
reversed.crowns: Overconfidence may leave you isolated, however successful.
reversed.future: Disappointment of being canceled or delayed due to lack of planning.
reversed.influences: Mundane and boring but likely the safest bet.
reversed.outcome: Even the best plans can fall apart, make sure you have a fallback.
reversed.past: Unable to make a decision and ended up doing nothing.
reversed.root: You have an ability to set long term goals, however you lack patience.
reversed.self: You don't see any reason to change, things seem to be working fine as they are.
reversed.situation: You have been putting off taking actions towards long term goals. This inaction could be your downfall if you don't make it a priority to get organized and handle your business.

upright.challenge: You have a choice to make, you know what it is you want now you have to make a plan for how to get it and stick with it.
upright.crowns: Taking risks, pioneering an idea, taking a different approach.
upright.future: You will get your chance to be heard, although you may find yourself isolated as a result of espousing your opinions so loudly.
upright.influences: Authority, boldness and originality, you are amongst the upper class of taste and wisdom, there are untapped riches awaiting your beckoning call.
upright.outcome: The time is right for a bold creative move, forget subtlety and old tired approaches.
upright.past: Intoxicating feelings of power. Realizing your potential and making plans to capitalize on your strengths.
upright.root: You're a powerful person that attracts like a magnet. You have started something and have definitely decided to pursue this new course as a means of validating yourself.
upright.self: You've earned your status and feel emboldened to express your opinions freely, you're in charge right now.
upright.situation: You have a plan and you are making it a reality. It's a good good time to explore beyond your comfort zone and try new things before committing to anything long term.

Two of Wands.description: A figure dressed in orange and red robes with a unique looking cap, is standing on a rooftop, holding a globe in one hand and a large staff in the other. They appear to be planning a venture out into the idyllic landscape of ocean and mountains. The staff planted firmly behind them indicates that they have backup plans.
Two of Wands.keywords: influence, dominion, plans, discovery, strength, boldness, revenge, shamelessness, restlesness
Two of Wands.name: Two of Wands
Two of Wands.reversedKeywords: obstinate, fear of unknown, lack of planning, turbulence, sagacious withdrawal, sadness, trouble
Two of Wands.title: Lord of Dominion

reversed.challenge: Break down your plans into smaller more realistic tasks.
reversed.crowns: You will manage to be civil with people and mind your attitude publicly.
reversed.future: Delays and roadblocks are likely ahead, plan accordingly and your long term goals should not be affected.
reversed.hope: Frequent travel sounds romantic to you.
reversed.influences: There is an obstacle or weakness that you can't work around.
reversed.outcome: Pay attention to the little things, they will add up eventually and make a difference.
reversed.past: You underestimated what it would take, maybe you rushed things or pushed yourself too hard.
reversed.root: You take time to invest in self improvement, you are not always met with success however you know if you will ever get to be where you want to be you have to keep trying.
reversed.self: Maybe it's time to get your proverbial shit together and acknowledge that you're stuck until you do.
reversed.situation: A blank canvas, you may not prepared for the challenges in your path.

upright.challenge: Dream beyond current limitations.
upright.crowns: You have a definite vantage point, premonitions or other intuitions.
upright.future: You are going to be in a strong position to take advantage of opportunities coming your way. Think past what you are doing today and plan for tomorrow, prepare to find what you seek.
upright.hope: Finding clarity and becoming a visionary.
upright.influences: Nobility, watchers from high vantage points.
upright.outcome: Now is the time to accept your vision and be confident that you can lead others to it.
upright.past: Informed courage allowed you to move fearlessly into new areas.
upright.root: You have a point of inner balance where you are clear about the things you want to create in your life.
upright.self: You have no shortage of optimism and ideas about what should be done or how to do it.
upright.situation: Taking the long view, not reacting, stepping back and considering all the options.

Three of Wands.description: A figure in a red robe, stands on a cliff watching sailing ships pass by, firmly gripping a staff in their right hand. Symbolizes plans that have been put into motion. Sometimes called the watcher.
Three of Wands.keywords: established force and strength, expansion, progress, acumen, nobility, realization of hope
Three of Wands.name: Three of Wands
Three of Wands.reversedKeywords: lack of foresight, assumptions, rude, conceit, obstinate, treacherous, insolent
