Three of Wands.title: Lord of Established Strength

reversed.challenge: Maintaining balance and self confidence.
reversed.crowns: Attain greater balance both within yourself and outward to the world.
reversed.future: Family tensions or uncertain feelings towards loved ones indicate a breakdown is imminent. You may be expecting those closest you to behave a certain way and become disappointed when they do not.
reversed.influences: Getting caught up in other people's problems and business.
reversed.outcome: It's likely that many shifts will occur before you become stable and settled.
reversed.past: Uncertainty and vague communication between yourself and others.
reversed.root: You know who you are and what you are made off, you will always be able to come home to yourself in that way.
reversed.self: Self doubt causing instability.
reversed.situation: There is a lack of harmony in your home, family or friends. You may be feeling uncertain about your relationships and who you can depend on as a result.

upright.challenge: Don't be afraid to claim happiness that is yours, when you break the bonds that bind you  feel triumphant and ready to move on.
upright.crowns: Breaking free of bonds, recognizing success and relishing the moment, this is how a secure phase of sociability can fulfill you. Allowing you to take a more active role in life, additionally your contacts with other people are solidified.
upright.future: Freedom and triumphant celebration ahead. You may have reached a milestone or a holiday is being observed, itâ€™s a good time get together with friends, family or colleagues to relax and laugh in harmony and joy associated with social gatherings.
upright.influences: Events that generate excitement.
upright.outcome: Excitement will be had, celebrate the joy of living, and move on to a new period of growth.
upright.past: The solemn side of celebration, as a chance to reflect on the joy of living.
upright.root: Life has a high as a kite feeling, you can feel the moment with the excitement of a child.
upright.self: Being able to contain childlike excitement as a mature adult.
upright.situation: Events and experiences that will generate excitement, could be surprise or planned celebration.

Four of Wands.description: Two figures are seen dancing with flowers and wreaths adorning four staffs in the ground, in the background a large castle with people gathered in support of the couples celebration.
Four of Wands.keywords: perfection, completion, rest after labor, success, celebration, harmony, cleverness, romance
Four of Wands.name: Four of Wands
Four of Wands.reversedKeywords: unreliable, unsteady, over anxiety, conflict with others, personal celebration, hurried, insincere
Four of Wands.title: Lord of Perfected Work

reversed.challenge: Align your head with your heart.
reversed.crowns: No longer having to prove yourself.
reversed.future: Drawing out matters of concern through conflict and assertion.
reversed.influences: Strong opinions and differing views, contention and disagreement.
reversed.outcome: It's possible you have worked through all you troubles with others and have no conflicts to worry about.
reversed.past: Avoiding situations that might cause discomfort or compromise your position in a matter.
reversed.root: Working through anger and hostility makes you stronger and more at peace with yourself.
reversed.self: No matter what you choose some will disagree with you, you have to make the decision that is best for your heart and your soul.
reversed.situation: An internal struggle is ending after working through anger and hostility.

upright.challenge: You must challenge yourself to change and adapt to new and difficult circumstances, your competition may be cut throat, or  under handed, your public self image may be at risk.
upright.crowns: Useful competition, fosters extra effort, excitement and encourages you to do your best.
upright.future: Be prepared for a bumpy ride, there is no coordinated effort, no agreement.
upright.influences: Your environment is diverse and at times chaotic as a result of so many different opinions.
upright.outcome: You will be facing some competition that you are not used to. This card is encouraging you to take this opportunity to improve yourself. Learn how to react without attaching personal feelings to your words.
upright.past: Everything is working at cross purposes.
upright.root: You can use competition to work for you.
upright.self: Competitiveness.
upright.situation: Shifting energies spark a transition, diversity and challenge bring about positive changes.

Five of Wands.description: A group of people brandishing wands as if engaged in an elegant, choreographed, combat dance. It's hard to tell if the group is at odds with another in a power struggle or merely having some sport for health.
Five of Wands.keywords: conflict, competition, arguments, aggression, tension, rivals, clashes of ego, strife, contest, cruelty, violence
Five of Wands.name: Five of Wands
Five of Wands.reversedKeywords: end of conflict, cooperation, agreements, truces, harmony, peace, avoiding conflict, lust, desire, trickery, complexity
Five of Wands.title: Lord of Strife

reversed.challenge: Self confidence can make you a target for others that would like to knock you down a peg, adjust your attitude to avoid trouble.
reversed.crowns: Asking yourself what success means for you.
reversed.future: You may be experiencing a very personal kind of success that is not shared or acknowledged amongst peers. You may lose confidence as a result if so it may be a good time to define what success means to you.
reversed.influences: Ego and judgement.
reversed.outcome: You will want to put yourself out there, criticism and challenge will be sure to find you regardless of what motivates you.
reversed.past: Fall from grace, self esteem takes some hits.
reversed.root: Reinventing your definition of success ensures your victory.
reversed.self: Avoiding attention from others.
reversed.situation: A milestone or a fall from grace? Moving on is likely the best option to fulfill your personal definition of success.

upright.challenge: Accepting success, enjoying self-esteem, believe in yourself, don't let guilt or fear stand in your way.
upright.crowns: Victory comes easily to you.
upright.future: Success is assured and the results of your actions will bring a happy outcome don't be afraid to be proud of yourself or share your successes publicly.
upright.influences: You have the support of others, encouragement to achieve your accomplishments is there if you are open to hearing it.
upright.outcome: You will enjoy your triumph and feel good about yourself.
upright.past: You are the victor, but too much pride could have lead to arrogance.
upright.root: You know that triumph does not mean beating someone else.
upright.self: Don't forget that individual achievements are not really individual at all.
upright.situation: You've been working hard toward a goal and success is finally within reach.

Six of Wands.description: A figure wearing a crowning wreath of victory, matching a wreath tied to their staff, rides a colorfully decorated white horse into town amongst a group celebratory townsfolk.
Six of Wands.keywords: success, public recognition, progress, self confidence, pleasure gained by labor, victory after strife, conquest, triumph, pride of riches
Six of Wands.name: Six of Wands
Six of Wands.reversedKeywords: fall from grace, personal definition of success, delay, fear, apprehension
Six of Wands.title: Lord of Victory

reversed.challenge: Passivity can be detrimental if you no longer stand for anything, stop giving in so easily, don't worry about making everyone happy.
reversed.crowns: Rebuild your self-esteem by having faith in yourself that you can.
reversed.future: Overwhelming challenges and opposition.
reversed.influences: Relentless questioning, challenging and oppositional behavior.
reversed.outcome: You must first acknowledge that you are over extended, then you can pick your battles and let go of the rest.
reversed.past: Ready to give up.
reversed.root: You know you won't be able to win all the battles, but there are some hills that you are willing to die on.
reversed.self: You're feeling overwhelmed by the constant pressure from external forces and are ready to give up, or pretend to give up so you can focus your energies elsewhere.
reversed.situation: External pressures have you feeling inadequate, as though you must compete with others and never let your guard down.

upright.challenge: Be ready for attacks from jealous friends or foes that fear you, map out a plan and confront the opposition with courage.
upright.crowns: Your strong convictions and strength of character make a difference.
upright.future: You will take a stand.
upright.influences: Honest characters with great strength and conviction.
upright.outcome: You will be approached by competitors, and envious people, this will be represented as some kind of threat to your accomplishments, nevertheless your prospects should be good because you are sparring from a favorable position, be skillful and alert!
upright.past: An energy of resistance has been set in motion.
upright.root: You don't let battle lines be drawn unless war is worth fighting.
upright.self: Taking a stand is a forceful act, you might feel pressured to act, or feel as though you are under attack for being successful, causing you to enforce your boundaries and fight back.
upright.situation: Taking a stand is a forceful act that changes the energy flow, when we take up firm position others do the same.

Seven of Wands.description: A figure standing on top a hill, wearing mismatched shoes, holds a staff in both hands defensively fighting six staffs below them. Indicates an unexpected struggle.
Seven of Wands.keywords: victory in small things, obstacles, difficulties yet courage to meet them, advantage, gain, overcoming opposition
Seven of Wands.name: Seven of Wands
Seven of Wands.reversedKeywords: wrangling and threatening, pretense, overwhelmed, obstacles, ignorance, minor victories
Seven of Wands.title: Lord of Valour

reversed.challenge: Align your resources so you can actively pursue your desires, don't rush into things, if you're feeling stuck try something new.
reversed.crowns: Be careful of shiny thing syndrome, continue to align yourself with long term goals.
reversed.future: Holding off on activities for while.
reversed.influences: Delays in travel, fast moving plans are jeopardized.
reversed.outcome: Stop and let go, 'be in the flow', and allow life to happen.
reversed.past: Resisting change.
reversed.root: Being able to slow down and consider next steps.
reversed.self: Jumping from one idea to another so that none are given enough time to prove themselves.
reversed.situation: Despite your enthusiasm expect delays, especially if Mercury is in retrograde, now may be a good time hold off or look for alternatives.

upright.challenge: Don't hesitate, if events are in motion they will proceed rapidly, strike while the iron is hot!
upright.crowns: Taking quick action
upright.future: All the elements are ready and will work for you if you don't hesitate.
upright.influences: Quick action, conclusions, news.
upright.outcome: Be patient, news is coming about swift changes that can bring positive growth for you to make an impact.
upright.past: It may be time to conclude whatever you have been doing, celebrate the past but move on to something new.
upright.root: Somehow you wile obtain that bit of information you need, before acting you think.
upright.self: There is something in the air, things are directly at hand, happening quickly, and you feel caught in a whirlwind.
upright.situation: You can expect to be busy, now is the time to declare yourself, stay alert, news could show up in a disguised form.

Eight of Wands.description: Eight staves in air, depending on the orientation of the card, upright or reversed, either coming to a landing or just taking flight into the clear blue sky.
Eight of Wands.keywords: rapid rush, too much force applied too suddenly, swiftness, courage, boldness, violence, love of open air
Eight of Wands.name: Eight of Wands
Eight of Wands.reversedKeywords: delays, loss of momentum, waiting, eloquent, not trustworthy, rapacious, theft, oppressive, dispute, jealousy
Eight of Wands.title: Lord of Swiftness

reversed.challenge: You will need to draw from deep within your internal resources to get through this.
reversed.crowns: Focus on what your own path, don't worry about what others are doing.
reversed.future: Unable to take on any new commitments, possibility of getting help with the things you have on your plate.
reversed.influences: It feels like being you are bing unfairly attacked, wether that is the reality or truth of the situation is uncertain to you.
reversed.outcome: You may offer help and support or just room to vent, but be sure to cut out the negative talk and replace it with facts and a starting point of assuming positive intent until/unless proven otherwise.
reversed.past: Ready to give up.
reversed.root: Acknowledging that setbacks are temporary will allow you to work on the next goal.
reversed.self: Overwhelmed by everything at the moment, could use the support of a friend or professional with some of the more mundane things.
reversed.situation: The struggle is real, setback after setback, nothing going your way and no end in sight.

upright.challenge: Try not to become bitter as your innocence and trust are gone and replaced by wary defensiveness. You carry battle scars but they serve to strengthen you as you move on.
upright.crowns: The hidden reserves you need to prevail are within you.
upright.future: Even if everyone seems to be against you, don't give up, don't let others project onto you what they want you to be, make it clear what you need.
upright.influences: Defensive, wary of being burned.
upright.outcome: Keep going no matter what, don't give up.
upright.past: Your trust has been replaced with defensiveness, especially when your hopes have been dashed.
upright.root: You've been burned before, your experience wounded you but it has strengthened you as well.
upright.self: You carry battle scars.
upright.situation: You must proceed carefully, with a watchful eye. Assert yourself, even if you feel battered and abused, you can do this.

Nine of Wands.description: An injured figure stands before eight staves, looking over their shoulder, whilst they stand clutching a ninth staff, ready to fight again if necessary. Indicates a health recovery or making it across a finish line.
Nine of Wands.keywords: great success but with strife, resilience, persistence, tremendous power, unshakable force, health, good recovery
Nine of Wands.name: Nine of Wands
Nine of Wands.reversedKeywords: apprehension, fear, doubtful, obstinate, calamity, disaster, delay
Nine of Wands.title: Lord of Great Strength

reversed.challenge: Lighten your load, delegate to others, put self care at the top of your priority list.
reversed.crowns: Releasing yourself from unnecessary activities, simplify your routines and conserve energy.
reversed.future: You will take on too much and begin to feel the burden of a heavy load.
reversed.influences: Burnout if somethings are not delegated to those around you.
reversed.outcome: You may be holding back from sharing the responsibility with others, or you might not know how to ask for help, but rest assured that time will pass and you will be free from the weight on your shoulders.
reversed.past: Work has been all consuming and you have been pushing yourself too hard. You may have reached the end but you are paying the price.
reversed.root: You'd like to take on the weight of the world if you could, but you cannot and you know it.
reversed.self: Everyone has a dark passenger that they carry with them, a secret or burden.
reversed.situation: You are taking on too much by yourself, wether by choice or circumstance.

upright.challenge: Be kind to yourself, lighten your load wherever you can.
upright.crowns: You will have to assume the lion share of the responsibility for right or wrong.
upright.future: You will push yourself and work very hard, take on extra burdens even though it will weight you down because you know what comes with the achievement of your goals. Accomplishment and rewards will be yours, and so also responsibility, learn to delegate in order to avoid burnout.
upright.influences: Working overtime, being held accountable, feeling burdened, fighting uphill.
upright.outcome: You are going to have to lighten your load somewhere, for the sake of your well-being and your health.
upright.past: Your struggle is complete, you may reward yourself and bask in the glory of success. More, new and different challenges are sure to come as you find yourself living in abundance.
upright.root: You always take on too much, or are otherwise left holding the bag.
upright.self: You push too hard to find success. Accomplishments only award you more work. Find ways to share the burden with those that benefit from your efforts.
upright.situation: If you are pushing yourself too hard you will need to cut back, otherwise this card indicates that life will be tougher than usual for a while.

Ten of Wands.description: A figure is shown carrying a large, heavy looking, collection of budding staves into town.
Ten of Wands.keywords: tremendous strength, burden, ill will, cruel and overbearing force, excessive pressure, selfish
Ten of Wands.name: Ten of Wands
Ten of Wands.reversedKeywords: doing it all, carrying the load, delegation, lying, malice, slander, envy, swiftness in evil, subterfuge
Ten of Wands.title: Lord of Oppression

reversed.challenge: Following through.
reversed.crowns: This reversal card, in this position, could be telling you to stop wasting your time chasing one idea after another. It seems likely, the way things are right now, your efforts will go nowhere.
reversed.future: Trying new projects or venues, finding alternatives to express your ideas.
reversed.influences: One great idea after another but lack of execution on any of them.
reversed.outcome: The beginnings of something might be forming, don't force it, allow it to come forth and blossom when the time it right.
reversed.past: Unable to get something started.
reversed.root: Access to a stream of ideas that seem to be ever flowing.
reversed.self: You know that inspiration comes from within.
reversed.situation: You are likely seeking something personal.

upright.challenge: Allow yourself to experience courage, charm and inspiration.
upright.crowns: You will get to use the thing inside you that guides you to make new discoveries, take risks and launch new ideas. Let the world know you're here.
upright.future: Your entire situation is suffused with spirit of excitement and adventure.
upright.influences: A child or young-at-heart adult whose interactions with you involve independence, high energy, risky behavior, or shared enthusiasms.
upright.outcome: Act on your opportunities to experience creativity and adventure.
upright.past: The essence of fire behaving as earth, such as wood or coal, a person of timidity, but whose innate passion can be easily ignited. This card can also represent chances of a new, or renewed, passion, to experience creativity. Feelings of intense enthusiasm, childlike imagination and charm.
upright.root: You feel free to express your individuality and power with light hearted abandon.
upright.self: Involvement of high energy, risky behavior.
upright.situation: An opening may appear that excites you, dares you to be great.

Page of Wands.description: A well dressed figure stands before a desert land holding a large staff. They are an advocator for spiritual advancement, dressed in orange and yellow robes, decorated with the symbol of transformation from bad to good, the salamander. The land behind them is barren, suggesting this Page can make anything happen.
Page of Wands.keywords: adventure, excitement, fresh ideas, cheerfulness, energetic, fearless, extroverted, desire for power, revenge, can be faithful
Page of Wands.name: Page of Wands
Page of Wands.path: The Rose of the Palace of Fire
Page of Wands.reversedKeywords: hasty, impatient, lacking ideas, tantrums, laziness, boring, unreliable, distracted ,theatrical, cruelty, domineering, a gossip
Page of Wands.title: The Princess of the Shining Flame

reversed.challenge: Refraining from saying what you really mean, acting with integrity and passion over strategy and appearances.
reversed.crowns: You are feeling creative restlessness, you are channeling something bigger than you may even understand but you feel it.
reversed.future: A build up of energy could end up opening new doors for you if managed properly.
reversed.influences: Circumstances out of your control are standing directly in your way, you have to work around them to get what you want.
reversed.outcome: You don't need to do everything at once, slow down take your time, know that you are in control here.
reversed.past: You have experienced a build up of energy that you can't seem to channel, for some reason you have been restricted from making moves.
reversed.root: Acting quickly, with confidence and often overachieving despite the doubt and shade thrown on you by those that see you as threat.
reversed.self: You might be good at covering up and masking but eventually it catches up with you. If you don't get or give yourself a break, you will crash and burn.
reversed.situation: You may have already or feel like you are very close to saying or doing something you will regret. Control your impulses to react immediately right now.

upright.challenge: Is your style balanced? Are you passionate or hot tempered, adventurous or reckless? The crossed knight seems to feel some kind of separation.
upright.crowns: Full of energy and life, not afraid to go for it, enthusiasm and creativity ensure there's never a dull moment.
upright.future: Good news is approaching you, the atmosphere will be of high spirits, passion and enthusiasm. This card may also represent a specific person who is faithful to you and whom you will be able to trust.
upright.hope: It may be time for a change
upright.influences: Someone bringing good news concerning work or social life, a vacation. Atmosphere of high spirits, passion, impulsiveness and impetuous exaggeration.
upright.outcome: Go for it, let yourself have fun.
upright.past: You've acted without thinking.
upright.root: You are an irresistible charmer.
upright.self: You can be irresponsible, shallow and thoughtless.
upright.situation: You're feeling charged up and ready to get things done.

Knight of Wands.description: Knight of Wands in action, charging forth on a fiery orange horse dressed in full armor under a bright yellow cloak patterned with black salamander insignia raising a sprouting wand in the air.
Knight of Wands.keywords: inspired action, impulsiveness, generous, impetuous, departure, active, fierce
Knight of Wands.name: Knight of Wands
Knight of Wands.path: King of the Spirits of Fire
Knight of Wands.reversedKeywords: haste, frustration, evil-minded, cruel, bigoted, brutal, discord
Knight of Wands.title: The Lord of Flame and Lightening

reversed.challenge: Bring you energy and attention inward on yourself, be yourself and access personal strengths and talents.
reversed.crowns: Courage to express who you are and how you feel.
reversed.future: Spending more time alone, less time socializing.
reversed.influences: There will always be someone that needs your help.
reversed.outcome: You have reached your position in life by understanding who you are and how you got here. You won't be swayed by the opinions of others.
reversed.past: You have defined yourself from a place of self confidence and diligent introspection.
reversed.root: You are honest and direct because you know yourself on a deeper level than most people know themselves.
reversed.self: You don't have to give the opinions of others too much attention knowing your personal strength comes from within.
reversed.situation: You know who you are and what is important to you, no need to put yourself out there if you don't feel like it.

upright.challenge: No matter what you have to tackle any task with enthusiasm.
upright.crowns: A quiet self-assurance that you can do whatever you want.
upright.future: Be ready to look for the positive in any situation.
upright.influences: The essence of fire behaving as water, like a rainbow a person whom has admirers, whom is the natural embodiment of passion and sensuality, their enthusiasm is contagious as they can reflect the desires of others and ignite them. A radiant and vibrant person, that sees what they want and goes after it to get it.
upright.outcome: A positive, cheerful atmosphere, and knowledge that you can do whatever you want.
upright.past: Fast paced, full and busy lifestyle.
upright.root: You are naturally strong and self assured.
upright.self: Self assurance can be thought of as arrogant.
upright.situation: Confidence and enthusiasm have special meaning to you right now, be inspired by them.

Queen of Wands.description: A Queen on a golden throne decorated with the head and crest of lions, symbolizing power and strength. In her hands she holds a staff with sprouting blooms and a sunflower representing fertility, happiness and growth. At her feet sits a black cat, a nod to the Queen's deep intuition and possible relationship with the occult.
Queen of Wands.keywords: courage, confidence, strong willed, optimistic, adaptable, steady force, understanding when she wants to be
Queen of Wands.name: Queen of Wands
Queen of Wands.reversedKeywords: low confidence, jealousy, selfish, bully, revengeful, domineering, obstinate, tyrannical, deceitful
Queen of Wands.title: Queen of the Thrones of Flame

reversed.challenge: Embrace followership ideology rather than leadership right now.
reversed.crowns: Don't let success get to your head, stay grounded in you expectations and avoid coming off as arrogant.
reversed.future: Take care that you do not thrash your supporters or take them for granted.
reversed.hope: You have many great privileges at your employ to create an unfair advantage if you wish to dominate.
reversed.influences: An aggressive leader, high ideals and pushes hard for others to buy in.
reversed.outcome: Arrogance and impulsivity will drive opportunities away.
reversed.past: Acting aggressively or with arrogance in pursuit of your own goals.
reversed.root: Highly ambitious, often setting yourself up for failure with impossible goals.
reversed.self: Leading others to your vision feels unattainable.
reversed.situation: Getting caught up in ego and hype.

upright.challenge: Use your courage and conviction to take risks and create results.
upright.crowns: Inspiration fuels ambition, unlimited charisma.
upright.future: An active generous force will enter.
upright.hope: You lead others naturally to implement plans of your own designs, staying focused on the goal until it becomes a reality.
upright.influences: This card may represents a specific person who is faithful to you and whom you are able to trust. An authoritative figure of fierce forceful energy whom will always advise you well. It may also represent an honest situation that is exactly as it appears to be with no hint of deception. It is an indication of good fortune coming your way perhaps in the form of unexpected help or advice, unexpected good news, a promotion, or the fulfillment of long-awaited hopes.
upright.outcome: The strong capable energy of a natural born leader can make reality from ideas.
upright.past: You've stepped in and taken the lead, while others followed.
upright.root: Trust in your ability to create and lead with confidence.
upright.self: You are larger than life most of the time, very dramatic.
upright.situation: A great daring leader, an artist who inspires others by taking hold of an idea and making it a reality by bold force and action. A charismatic, honest, striking and magnetic personality. This card can also represent the essence of fire drawing on the powers of air, such as lightening, daring drama, forceful activity and creation is central to you at this time, be inspired by enthusiasm you feel.

King of Wands.description: A King sits on a throne decorated with Lions and Salamanders, representing fire and strength, holding a blossoming staff, symbolizing their fertility and creative power.
King of Wands.keywords: natural born leader, vision, entrepreneur, honor, swift, strong, violent
King of Wands.lordOf: The Prince of the Chariot of Fire
King of Wands.name: King of Wands
King of Wands.reversedKeywords: haste, ruthlessness, high expectations, impulsiveness, intolerant, prejudiced, cruel, ill natured
King of Wands.title: Prince of the Chariot of Fire

reversed.challenge: Stop and make sure that you have enough of what you need, don't make another move forward until you have regained your optimism.
reversed.crowns: Once all blockages have been cleared you will be able to see the opportunities.
reversed.future: A period of being or feeling alone, no friends or support on your side.
reversed.influences: Discord and disappointment surround you, but it does open up some previously unnoticed opportunities.
reversed.outcome: The connection you are hoping for isn't likely to happen, it might be beneficial to accept the reasons for it rather than focus on the disappointment.
reversed.past: You were stunned or caught off guard by something emotionally charged, you may have become blocked off to experiencing good feelings since.
reversed.root: Your emotional maturity and character of the heart ensures you will always find a way to derive pleasure from any situation.
reversed.self: You have lost something deeply emotional, your flow may be blocked or you cannot conjure any new ideas, just as the water has been drained from the upside down cup in the reversed card, so has your inspiration and joy.
reversed.situation: Holding back for the time being, you are holding your feelings close, just be careful not to repress them, take care of yourself privately if you have to.

upright.challenge: Still your emotions long enough for you to merge from confusion.
upright.crowns: Love is the most powerful effective emotion you have.
upright.future: An idealized love that happens off in a distant future, is a poor excuse for not finding love now.
upright.hope: Feeling truly loved, and truly loving others.
upright.influences: There is a spanning out of compassion and love, this card holds luck and and deepest happiness, love in all it's forms.
upright.outcome: New sparks of passion and hope fill you up and mark the beginning of a new relationship.
upright.past: Love peace and regular renewal are key in igniting new emotional highs in your life.
upright.root: There is no end to the beauty you may allow into your life if you hold yourself in a place of love.
upright.self: You're ready to let go of baggage, forgive yourself, open up emotionally and start, or restart, fresh and new.
upright.situation: Start new endeavors from a place of love and everything will be blessed.

Ace of Cups.description: A cloud with a hand offering a an overflowing cup of clear and sparkling water, symbolizing pure emotional energy. It is the feminine, receptive, complement to the Ace of Wands. The Great Mother, Binah.
Ace of Cups.keywords: exuberant love, new feelings, emotional awakening, creativity, spirituality, intuition
Ace of Cups.name: Ace of Cups
Ace of Cups.reversedKeywords: coldness, emptiness, emotional loss, blocked creativity, feeling unloved, gloominess
Ace of Cups.title: The Root Powers of Water

reversed.challenge: You need to find a place of self acceptance, self respect and self love, you can't love anyone else if you don't love yourself.
reversed.crowns: Find your joy and bliss through healing transformation.
reversed.future: Talk less and listen more, rise above it in order to re-establish harmony.
reversed.hope: Self love. Having it is essential before you can love anyone else, or become good at projecting anything inside of you to others.
reversed.influences: Miscommunications, egos and pride getting in the way, be selective about who you trust.
reversed.outcome: You may find yourself out of sync, communication is increasingly more strained and a lack of trust grows.
reversed.past: Petty resentments added up and communication was lost.
reversed.root: You have trouble getting close to others due to past relationships.
reversed.self: You can agree to disagree, peacefully disengage and walk away for your own well being, you can love from a distance.
reversed.situation: Where there was once balance there is now a repellant force. Communication is lacking and resentments are growing.

upright.challenge: If you are in conflict look for truce, now is not the time to separate, look for partnerships.
upright.crowns: Find one on one connections in your life working together forgiving and forgetting and moving forward together.
upright.future: Reconciliation is about to happen, your relationship will become stronger as a result.
upright.influences: Bonds for life, be mindful and take your time in getting to know your partners.
upright.outcome: Two forces will be drawn together and bonded, this may refer to the meeting of a kindred spirit, a merger or partnership.
upright.past: You had a genuine connection that shaped who you are, regardless of how it ended it impacted both of you.
upright.root: You are warm and good natured, others find you to be a healing strength and you form loving devoted relationships.
upright.self: You feel connected to someone in a way that isn't romantic, but still very intimate, symbiotic or telepathic.
upright.situation: Undeniable attraction, the beauty and power when two forces are drawn together. Indicates that you are in a strong and balanced partnership.

Two of Cups.description:
Two figures, touch as they exchange cups beneath a caduceus, representing the masculine and feminine energies merged into one nature. 

The Red Lion of Alchemy, representing sexual passion, becomes aware of the magical world within the spiraling upwards kundalini force.
Two of Cups.keywords: love, partnership, mutual attraction, harmony, pleasure, mirth, passion
Two of Cups.name: Two of Cups
Two of Cups.reversedKeywords: breakups, disharmony, distrust, unfaithfulness, hatred, subtlety, folly, waste, disunion
Two of Cups.title: Lord of Love

reversed.challenge: Some balance is required in order to sustain this relationship.
reversed.crowns: You have no time in your schedule for social interactions, and as time passes you grow apart from people you care about.
reversed.future: A group is disbanding and going their separate ways.
reversed.influences: Backstabbing and sabotage instead of empathy and support.
reversed.outcome: Watch your back jealousy and envy can make you a target even with friends.
reversed.past: You've grown apart from people and things you used to spend time with.
reversed.root: Trust is a spectrum, you have a keen sense of who is not on your side, even if they are acting as thought they are.
reversed.self: You feel like keeping to yourself, no need to socialize with others right now.
reversed.situation: You have been withdrawn, going solo, taking a break from the scene.

upright.challenge: You have a sense of gratification and fulfillment that is more sensual rather than deeply emotional.
upright.crowns: Intoxicating feelings of love and compassion, resolving social issues or bonding with a group of people over shared life experiences.
upright.future: Celebrations spontaneously arise when people feel connected.
upright.hope: Connecting with others, collaborating and feeling intoxicatingly good from being in a group environment.
upright.influences: Groups, community, networks.
upright.outcome: You will find your harmonic resonance through teamwork.
upright.past: Friends and community created when you interacted with others.
upright.root: Coming together in love, groups and teamwork.
upright.self: Examine your group bonds.
upright.situation: A mood or experience that makes you feel like dancing and singing.

Three of Cups.description: Three figures dancing in celebration with raised cups in the air, wearing green wreaths of victory on their heads. They are surrounded by a blooming field of flowers to further indicate beauty, growth and joy.
Three of Cups.keywords: friendship, community, gatherings, celebrations, group events, social events, abundance, success, pleasure, healing, kindness, bounty
Three of Cups.name: Three of Cups
Three of Cups.reversedKeywords: gossip, scandal, excess, isolation, loneliness, solitude, imbalanced social life, overabundance, loss of prestige
Three of Cups.title: Lord of Abundance

reversed.challenge: Make space for yourself, but not so much that you lose touch with others, or miss deadlines.
reversed.crowns: Taking time to introspect and make choices that are best for you.
reversed.future: Always choosing not to participate could have serious affects on your relationships with others.
reversed.influences: You are feeling withdrawn or reluctant to open up, don't isolate yourself for too long, let others know you're not disinterested in them you just need some time alone.
reversed.outcome: You've had time to introspect and are ready to act, not react, when the time is right.
reversed.past: Avoiding certain people or things in hopes they would go away.
reversed.root: Withdraw and isolation can go a long way towards self preservation.
reversed.self: You'd prefer to stay out of it, all of it, be on your own for the time being.
reversed.situation: Hibernating, laying low, reluctant to start anything or go out.

upright.challenge: You need to get unstuck emotionally, otherwise you will miss the gifts being offered to you.
upright.crowns: Going deep within, meditation and concentration.
upright.future: Open yourself to your surroundings and soon you will be on your way again.
upright.influences: Everything refers back to yourself.
upright.outcome: You have been allowed time for self-reflection, open yourself up to your surroundings and move on feeling renewed.
upright.past: You've lost interest in activities that used to bring you pleasure, which may have extended from intense forms of strife, spite, or embitterment.
upright.root: When life is too stressful you are able to devote time and energy to yourself and renew your emotional balance.
upright.self: Are you being too self-absorbed?
upright.situation: A positive period of self-reflection is needed, time to muse, dream and restore your balance.

Four of Cups.description: A figure is seen deep in contemplation, legs and arms crossed, and eyes close, closed off to the offering of a cup from a hand in a cloud, and to three other cups on the ground.
Four of Cups.keywords: success or pleasure possibly reaching and end, contemplation, apathy, the good with the bad, acquisition by contention
Four of Cups.name: Four of Cups
Four of Cups.reversedKeywords: retreat, withdraw, overly self involved, new approaches to old problems, new possibilities
Four of Cups.title: Lord of Blended Pleasure

reversed.challenge: You have been putting too much pressure on yourself, loosen up, go easy on yourself and allow others in to help you. Ask for forgiveness if you feel guilty.
reversed.crowns: Realizing how significant the things that happened to you, that you did or that you were a part of in the past have been in getting you to where you are now.
reversed.future: Enlightenment after forgiveness.
reversed.influences: Painful memories can be bitter reminders or positive indicators for new opportunities.
reversed.outcome: Setbacks and pain are part of life, accept your defeat and move on with hope of what the future may bring.
reversed.past: Mistakes and setbacks that you have been able to learn from.
reversed.root: No experience is wasted, learning from pain in a way that gives you greater strength in life's journey as you press on.
reversed.self: You might be feeling as though you've made a mistake or lost a good opportunity, what you don't realize right now is that something better is ahead, you need to make peace and move on.
reversed.situation: A setback or disappointment is keeping you from moving on. You are discovering how to take risks again and open up to new opportunities.

upright.challenge: Look beyond the pain, accept your loss realizing the value you still have. If you are frustrated or disappointed, realize things happen they way they did for reasons, learn from mistakes don't let them upset you.
upright.crowns: Initiate change through letting go.
upright.future: The more you struggle to hold onto what is gone the more you will suffer.
upright.influences: Denial, resistance to change.
upright.outcome: Shadows of melancholy, distress and sorrow will be cast over you. You will have to let go and cut your losses, there are new opportunities waiting for you, also you will be able to count on your friends for support.
upright.past: Accepting loss.
upright.root: Every loss opens new possibilities for growth.
upright.self: Acknowledge what is there for you despite your loss.
upright.situation: The situation is one of loss, and your emotional resistance to change, wallowing in self pity and blame.

Five of Cups.description: A cloaked figure stands grieving over the loss of three overturned cups before them, oblivious to the two cups behind them. In the background a bridge over water leads to the security of the castle on the shore. The sentiment being 'build a bridge and get over it' rather than staying stuck mourning the loss of what is gone at the expense of your own life experiences.
Five of Cups.keywords: death, end of pleasure, sorrow and loss, regret
Five of Cups.name: Five of Cups
Five of Cups.reversedKeywords: personal setbacks, self forgiveness, moving on emotionally, shifting mindset from ways of the past
Five of Cups.title: The Lord of the Loss in Pleasure

reversed.challenge: Learn from mistakes, forgive others, and yourself, freely, make time to be present.
reversed.crowns: Making peace with the past, forgiveness for yourself and others.
reversed.future: Making time to indulge.
reversed.hope: Focus on the present and be aware.
reversed.influences: Reminiscing about the past.
reversed.outcome: Not reaching goals is sometimes part of the path. Don't blame yourself for what you did in the past focus on what you are doing now.
reversed.past: Getting stuck in the past, repetitive behavior.
reversed.root: Regardless of circumstance you can make time to have fun, or just time out.
reversed.self: Reflection and nostalgia.
reversed.situation: Dwelling on the past keeps you from living in the now.

upright.challenge: Connect with your inner child, be playful, ask questions, open your mind and your heart.
upright.crowns: Innocence protects you
upright.future: You will indulge in play, have a noble impulse or shun corruption.
upright.influences: Sweetness, a baby or young person.
upright.outcome: Be kind, generous and enjoy simple goodness.
upright.past: Sharing what you have.
upright.root: You embrace and treasure the feelings associated with childhood.
upright.self: Innocence.
upright.situation: Being surrounded by simple goodness, a relationship of small gestures that are barely noticed but are so important. Children may be a large part of it.

Six of Cups.description: Two children playing in a courtyard, surrounded by cups filled with flowers, the older child gently hands the younger child a cup. This represents innocence, harmony and security.
Six of Cups.keywords: beginning of happiness, childhood memories, innocence, joy, contention, nostalgia, steady gain
Six of Cups.name: Six of Cups
Six of Cups.reversedKeywords: defective knowledge, affront, living in the past, strife arising from unwarranted self-assertion and vanity, presumptuousness, thankless
Six of Cups.title: The Lord of Pleasure

reversed.challenge: Reduce the number of things you allow yourself to pay attention to, focus on one thing and do it well.
reversed.crowns: Self reflection, finding what you want for the long term.
reversed.future: Multiple doors will be open to you.
reversed.influences: A reality check, some help finding clarity and getting you back on the path after feeling lost.
reversed.outcome: You circumstances are not as bad as you are allowing yourself to think they are, let go of negative energy and focus your thoughts on the positive.
reversed.past: Several choices were available to you.
reversed.root: You don't need to keep searching for the next big idea to come to you, you already have enough possibilities within reach.
reversed.self: You rely on intuition, maybe more than you even know.
reversed.situation: Multiple opportunities are available to you right now, but you have to make a choice.

upright.challenge: Make sure you are backing up your work with effort, tighten up and commit to doing what it takes.
upright.crowns: A tremendous release of creative energy amazes and bewilders you.
upright.future: Some tightening may be necessary if you are in a chaotic environment, otherwise look carefully at how disordered you think your situation is, and decide when to let go of fantasies and concentrate instead on a single realistic plan.
upright.influences: A mirage of illusions encase you dreams, imagination, and many options, however there is a positive aspect of you are prepared to let go of fantasies and concentrate instead on a single realistic plan.
upright.outcome: You will let go and as a result be faced with many options, choose carefully as all things are not always what they seem.
upright.past: Overindulging, getting caught up, letting everything go.
upright.root: Balance comes to you and whatever is sloppy impractical or lax.
upright.self: Back your plans up with work.
upright.situation: You have options but don't let them go to your head. The grass always looks greener on the other side when you fantasize about what the other side looks like, in other words do you homework before making a choice.

Seven of Cups.description: A figure stands in amazement and awe in front of seven cups filled with various gifts, some of which are dangerous curses, floating atop grey clouds. This represents the illusionary nature of the mind to wish and dream for things that we no know nothing about, essentially be careful what you wish for.
Seven of Cups.keywords: illusionary success, deception in love and friendships, promises unfulfilled, lying, fantasy, wishful thinking, drunkenness
Seven of Cups.name: Seven of Cups
Seven of Cups.reversedKeywords: personal values, too many choices, desire, lust, vanity, wrath
Seven of Cups.title: Lord of Illusionary Success

reversed.challenge: Listen to your heart and have the courage to pursue what is right for you, not what others think is right for you.
reversed.crowns: Check in with your heart for the next course of action.
reversed.future: Not feeling satisfied staying in one place.
reversed.influences: A state of confusion.
reversed.outcome: You're going to have to check in with yourself and ask if this situation is worth one more chance or not.
reversed.past: Loss of pleasure or desire for something that once brought you joy.
reversed.root: You have built something that feels safe and secure.
reversed.self: You know what you should do, yet you remain stuck in your comfort zone.
reversed.situation: Not knowing what is best, you are stuck between wanting to change yet scared to leave a comfortable situation.

upright.challenge: Reexamine your life and your priorities, ask yourself what would bring contentment on a deeper level.
upright.crowns: Seeking deeper meaning, starting a trip of unknown length.
upright.future: You will wake up and realize that you have been asleep, living a dream that no longer satisfies.
upright.influences: Restlessness, lack of energy, tired, dispirited.
upright.outcome: It's time to move on in search of a deeper truth or reality.
upright.past: You have turned away from your old feelings to strike out a new path.
upright.root: You can see the signs of change and move swiftly in accordance. You have strong will and mental power, the ability to detach in order to work on self improvement for personal growth and understanding.
upright.self: Let go, the past is gone.
upright.situation: An end is approaching, despite your best efforts you realize things are not serving you well and it's time to move on.

Eight of Cups.description: A cloaked figure has turned their back and walked away from a stacked arrangement of eight cups into two rows, the top row gives the appearance of having a missing cup in the center, signifying lack of emotional fulfillment. The moon in the sky indicates the person is sneaking away in the dark of night.
Eight of Cups.keywords: temporary success, abandonment, fleeing, detachment, nothing has lasting value, instability, searching
Eight of Cups.name: Eight of Cups
Eight of Cups.title: Lord of Abandoned Success

reversed.challenge: Instead of looking outward for acceptance, try looking inward.
reversed.crowns: With great power, comes great responsibility.
reversed.future: Re-evaluating what's important to you for the long term.
reversed.influences: Overindulgence, unnecessary spending or gambling.
reversed.outcome: Frustrated that things aren't going as you had hoped, possibly over indulging in activities that are prone for self destruction, the only way you will be able to gain satisfaction and approval is from within.
reversed.past: Unrealistic expectations, goals not reached as a result.
reversed.root: You may enjoy indulgence but you are also able to pull it in when necessary.
reversed.self: Asking yourself what would really make you happy.
reversed.situation: The wish card, shows your wishes come true, you shouldn't need to ask for anything more, but something feels missing.

upright.challenge: Count your blessings, show gratitude for what you have, realize that all things are temporary and could be change course at any time.
upright.crowns: You can commune with the natural world and the body of the Mother Earth.
upright.future: you will experience some luxury.
upright.influences: Satisfaction, sensual pleasure.
upright.outcome: Sit back and enjoy your good fortune, do not be tempted to indulge yourself at the cost of someone else.
upright.past: Pure indulgence and self satisfaction.
upright.root: You are content to sit back and revel in the knowledge that everything is alright in the world.
upright.self: You indulge in smugness.
upright.situation: Complete satisfaction, fulfillment, contentment. Enjoy it, indulge in it, and be grateful for it.

Nine of Cups.description: A figure sits upright with arms crossed on a wooden bench below and arc of nine cups raised overhead, representing emotional fulfillment, psychological safety and comfort.
Nine of Cups.keywords: realization of pleasure, satisfaction, self praise, almost perfect, wishes fulfilled, self praise, vanity, high-minded, apt to be maligned through too much self assumption
Nine of Cups.name: Nine of Cups
Nine of Cups.reversedKeywords: materialism, material loss, dissatisfaction, indulgence, mistakes, imperfections
Nine of Cups.title: Lord of Material Happiness

reversed.challenge: Recognize your expectations are not always going to align with others ideals and be okay with the resulting outcomes of that.
reversed.crowns: Empathize with others, realize everyone is struggling, find common ground and open lines of communication.
reversed.future: Feeling disconnected or separate from others, having to ask yourself if you still believe in what you are doing.
reversed.hope: Holding space for others to communicate their views.
reversed.influences: We are all divine beings worthy of love.
reversed.outcome: Love and happiness with others begins with loving and being happy with ourselves.
reversed.past: Focusing inward to either gain clarity or make progress towards a goal.
reversed.root: You know what an ideal relationship feels like, you also now when values don't align, you are good at cutting back involvement with acquittances that don't support your highest good.
reversed.self: Seeking a deeper connection or feeling of peace and harmony.
reversed.situation: Things are not going as well as they should be, or used to be, something's amiss.

upright.challenge: Looks for ways to realize joy and create peace, follow you heart, recognize when something feels good, and do more of it, and when something feels bad, do less of it, it's that simple if you allow it to be.
upright.crowns: Inner peace and outer peace, when you are in harmony with yourself you experience harmony in your environment.
upright.future: You are about to reach fulfillment of something personal.
upright.influences: Radiating love, relaxing.
upright.outcome: Fulfillment is waiting for you, it goes beyond joy and happiness.
upright.past: Peace and abundant blessings.
upright.root: You may find the key to happiness in your own family, or a group of people you are attached to emotionally.
upright.self: Inner peace.
upright.situation: This is a blissful reflection of your inner peace, if you are in conflict an end is possible. Your inner circle is harmonious and supportive and you have a sense of who you are.

Ten of Cups.description: An idyllic scene, two children play in a grassy field just behind a cozy home on a hill, two adult caretakers with arms embraced and also in the air in salutation to the rainbow above, signify everlasting Divine love.
Ten of Cups.keywords: permanent and lasting success, peace making, good fortune, generosity, pleasure
Ten of Cups.name: Ten of Cups

reversed.challenge: Don't allow fear of failure to stop you before you even start, get it out there see what happens.
reversed.crowns: Intuition as an inner guidance system.
reversed.future: Feeling called to pursue a new creative interest but you're unsure of how to begin.
reversed.influences: Someone that lacks emotional maturity, prone to tantrums and thinking highly of themselves.
reversed.outcome: Creative outlets may appear unattractive due to the level of exposure they would bring to yourself in the external environment.
reversed.past: Holding yourself back from expressing yourself creatively.
reversed.root: Disappointment, sadness, heartbreak and sorrow have left you with many emotional wounds.
reversed.self: The ideas are there and you can feel the inspiration, but for some reason you're still holding back.
reversed.situation: Feeling stuck or blocked, not being able to make ideas happen.

upright.challenge: You need to help a person whom is a danger to themselves, gentle handling is required, it may be you, if it is allow yourself to experience love intimacy and spirituality.
upright.crowns: Your entire spirit is infused with love and emotion that guide you as you go through an awakening.
upright.future: You may need to guide a person or yourself through an awakening, be aware of the necessities of the situation.
upright.influences: A person whose actions are in need of some gentle guidance away from romantic and toward practical reality.
upright.outcome: Act on an opportunity that stirs your emotions, pulls at your heart strings and brings you great joy.
upright.past: Involvement with emotional needs and moodiness, the feelings may have been at once exciting and scary, but received by you with feelings of gratitude, there further indicates emotional risk in which you lost yourself.
upright.root: You feel free to express your feelings with light hearted abandon,however you should be mindful of your assumptions when you do.
upright.self: Moodiness and naive assumptions need to resolved in order to really look at the reality of the situation.
upright.situation: A person whose innocence may be dangerous to themselves. This card may also represent opportunities for love or reconciliation at your door. There is inherent emotional risk, may also offer peace after dischord or sympathy in times of pain

reversed.challenge: Control your moods and emotions.
reversed.crowns: Avoid making decisions while you feel emotional.
reversed.future: Losing your cool, jumping to conclusions and making judgements without information.
reversed.hope: Instinctually fast decisions are made from emotional responses without having all the information.
reversed.influences: Passive aggressive, appealing at first then turns into something much different.
reversed.outcome: A creative project is emerging even if you are not yet ready to get to work on it.
reversed.past: Getting caught in the moment, not thinking things through.
reversed.root: You allow your emotions to control your life.
reversed.self: You know the damage you can inflict when you let your emotions control you, although things may be going well now things could change in an instant.
reversed.situation: A person that is disconnected from reality, makes irrational decisions in the heat of the moment and realizes only later what they have done, if at all.

upright.challenge: Find a balance, are you romantic or overemotional, imaginative or a daydreamer?
upright.crowns: You can use your imagination to tap into your deepest levels of emotion.
upright.future: Goals are far away, and balance needs to be found between appropriate and excessive.
upright.hope: You lead your life with your heart, not your head. A romantic in touch with their emotions attractive to  most people your mates will bring signifigant emotional value to your creative works.
upright.influences: An atmosphere of loving peacefulness, sensitive, romantic, fantasy and  illusion envelopes you.
upright.outcome: Deep emotional levels can be reached, however if emotion is ruling over common sense it may be time for a change.
upright.past: Legendary melodramatic moods have ensued after letting your emotions get the better of you.
upright.root: You know how to create beauty and share it with others.
upright.self: You are in touch with your emotions, you know that you will follow your heart in this matter and that your soul will become enriched from doing so.
upright.situation: A sensitive soul.

reversed.challenge: Find ways to detach from unhealthy or codependent relationships.
reversed.crowns: Emotional well being and boundaries set to hold space for yourself.
reversed.future: Stress levels are getting dangerously high.
reversed.influences: Emotionally unstable, loss of perspective and increased levels of stress.
reversed.outcome: You are great at taking care of others, but not so much yourself, take time to do so before you become emotionally drained.
reversed.past: You allowed emotions to get bottled up and created a stressful situation that got out of hand. You may have said or done things you regret as a result.
reversed.root: Helping others help themselves, you understand that it is a two way street with responsibility to let go on both sides.
reversed.self: You could use some quiet time to reconnect with your inner self right now.
reversed.situation: Feeling consumed by things that you shouldn't be.

upright.challenge: Do no react with impatience or anger, let your heart lead the way.
upright.crowns: You can sense emotional currents and know what others are experiencing without having to ask.
upright.future: A sweet, loving and sensitive force will enter your life.
upright.influences: There is gentle soothing calmness around you.
upright.outcome: You will let you heart lead the way.
upright.past: You trusted your inner voice and were triumphant, your love included and embraced everyone, you were the rock that others could lean on.
upright.root: You trust your intuition and are more open to what comes from within yourself and beyond.
upright.self: Often moved by beauty and tragedy of life you can become insecure and needy. Rise above your challenges.
upright.situation: Gentle love, acceptance and respect for feelings have special meaning to you right now, let that inspire you.

reversed.future: There will be a confrontation, emotions will be tested.

upright.challenge: Maintain a calm, relaxed, tolerant, and patient state in order to show the way with loving attention.
upright.crowns: Deep knowledge of the world that comes from the heart.
upright.future: You will seem to know intuitively what is called for at any moment.

upright.outcome: There will be a peacefulness around you that others will respond to.
upright.past: Others turn to you for advice because they know you will listen.
upright.root: You care about others sincerely, you heal with a gentle touch and a quiet word.
upright.self: You are in control of your emotions and exhibit a deep understanding of yourself, making you a sensitive leader that can respond to emotional needs.

King of Cups.description:
The King adorned by crown, golden and blue robes, holding both a cup and scepter sit upon a throne of rock amidst turbulent waters. The figure appears to have scaled feet, like a reptile or fish, the right foot dipped into the rushing waters below.

A subtle, violent, crafty and artistic person. A fierce nature with a calm exterior. A powerful force for good or evil, but more attracted by evil. If ill-dignified they can be intensely evil.
King of Cups.keywords: emotionally secure, balanced, strong yet compassionate
King of Cups.name: King of Cups
King of Cups.title: Lord of Waves and Waters
